tika-s0101t0:3_2: taṃ sammadeva tesaṃ uggahadhāraṇādikkamaladdhabbāya sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbahitasukhanipphādanatthaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:3_6: āyatiṃ paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanato ca saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmakiriyā.
tika-s0101t0:3_15: Vatthuttayapūjā hi niratisayapuññakkhettasambuddhiyā aparimeyyappabhāvo puññātisayoti bahuvidhantarāyepi
tika-s0101t0:4_0: “Pūjārahe pūjayato, buddhe yadi va sāvake”tiādi, tathā –
tika-s0101t0:5_0: “Ye bhikkhave buddhe pasannā, agge te pasannā. Agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko hotī”tiādi.
tika-s0101t0:7_0: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenapi jambudīpassa.
tika-s0101t0:10_2: nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-s0101t0:14_3: vandanārahe ca katā vandanā yathādhippetappayojanaṃ sādhetīti.
tika-s0101t0:14_7: atha kho karuṇāpaññāppadhānāti tadubhayappadhānameva tāva sammāsambuddhassa thomanaṃ kātuṃ taṃmūlakattā
tika-s0101t0:15_6: paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ kampanaṃ hadayakhedaṃ karotīti vā karuṇā.
tika-s0101t0:15_15: byāpādāratīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkatāya ca sattasantānagatasantāpavicchedanākārappavattiyā mettāmuditānampi cittasītalabhāvakāraṇatā upalabbhati,
tika-s0101t0:15_16: tathāpi dukkhāpanayanākārappavattiyā parūpatāpāsahanarasā avihiṃsābhūtā karuṇā visesena bhagavato cittassa
tika-s0101t0:15_18: Karuṇāmukhena vā mettāmuditānampi hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇatā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:16_0: Atha vā asādhāraṇañāṇavisesanibandhanabhūtā sātisayaṃ niravasesañca sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ viya savisayabyāpitāya
tika-s0101t0:16_1: mahākaruṇābhāvaṃ upagatā karuṇāva bhagavato atisayena hadayasītalabhāvahetūti āha “karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti.
tika-s0101t0:16_2: Atha vā satipi mettāmuditānaṃ sātisaye hadayasītībhāvanibandhanatte sakalabuddhaguṇavisesakāraṇatāya
tika-s0101t0:16_3: tāsampi kāraṇanti karuṇāva bhagavato hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇaṃ vuttā.
tika-s0101t0:16_8: Etasmiñca atthavikappe tīsupi avatthāsu bhagavato karuṇā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:17_2: Paññāva ñeyyāvaraṇappahānato pakārehi dhammasabhāvāvajotanaṭṭhena pajjototi paññāpajjoto,
tika-s0101t0:17_8: sveva visayasabhāvapaṭicchādanato andhakārasarikkhatāya tamo viyāti tamo,
tika-s0101t0:17_11: Sabbesampi hi khīṇāsavānaṃ satipi paññāpajjotena avijjāndhakārassa vihatabhāve saddhādhimuttehi viya diṭṭhippattānaṃ sāvakehi,
tika-s0101t0:17_12: paccekasambuddhehi ca savāsanappahānena sammāsambuddhānaṃ kilesappahānassa viseso vijjatīti sātisayena
tika-s0101t0:18_0: Atha vā antarena paropadesaṃ attano santāne accantaṃ avijjāndhakāravigamassa nibbattitattā,
tika-s0101t0:18_3: parasantatiyañca dhammadesanātisayānubhāvena sammadeva tassa pavattitattā bhagavāva visesato mohatamavigamena
tika-s0101t0:18_5: Imasmiñca atthavikappe “paññāpajjoto”ti padena bhagavato paṭivedhapaññā viya desanāpaññāpi sāmaññaniddesena ekasesanayena vā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:19_0: Atha vā bhagavato ñāṇassa ñeyyapariyantikattā sakalañeyyadhammasabhāvābodhanasamatthena anāvaraṇañāṇasaṅkhātena
tika-s0101t0:19_1: paññāpajjotena sabbañeyyadhammasabhāvacchādakassa mohandhakārassa vidhamitattā anaññasādhāraṇo bhagavato
tika-s0101t0:19_3: Ettha ca mohatamavidhamanante adhigatattā anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ kāraṇūpacārena sakasantāne mohatamavidhamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:19_5: parasantāne pana mohatamavidhamanassa kāraṇabhāvato anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ “mohatamavidhamana”nti vuccatīti.
tika-s0101t0:20_0: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ avijjāvigghāto yeveko pahānasampattivasena bhagavato thomanānimittaṃ gayhati,
tika-s0101t0:20_3: Na hi so tādiso kileso atthi,
tika-s0101t0:20_5: Atha vā vijjā viya sakalakusaladhammasamuppattiyā niravasesākusaladhammanibbattiyā,
tika-s0101t0:20_6: saṃsārappavattiyā ca avijjā padhānakāraṇanti tabbigghātavacanena sakalasaṃkilesagaṇasamugghāto vuttoyeva
tika-s0101t0:21_2: sanarāmaro ca so loko cāti sanarāmaraloko,
tika-s0101t0:21_5: Etena devamanussānaṃ viya tadavasiṭṭhasattānampi yathārahaṃ guṇavisesāvahato bhagavato upakāritaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:21_9: Edisesu hi samāsapadesu padhānampi appadhānaṃ viya niddisīyati yathā –
tika-s0101t0:21_12: garubhāvassa pana adhippetattā garukaraṇasamatthasseva yujjanato sattalokassavasena attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0101t0:21_13: So hi lokiyanti ettha puññapāpāni tabbipāko cāti “loko”ti vuccati.
tika-s0101t0:22_3: sanarā ca te amarā ceti sanarāmarā,
tika-s0101t0:22_4: tesaṃ lokoti sanarāmaralokoti purimanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. Amara-
tika-s0101t0:22_9: Tathā hi sabbānatthapariharaṇapubbaṅgamāya niravasesahitasukhavidhānatapparāya niratisayāya payogasampattiyā
tika-s0101t0:22_11: aparimitanirupamappabhāvaguṇavisesasamaṅgitāya ca sabbasattuttamo bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uttamaṃ gāravaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:23_1: Bhagavato hi veneyyajanupasaṅkamanaṃ ekantena tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:24_0: Atha vā sayambhuñāṇena sakalampi lokaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto ñāṇena sammā gato avagatoti sugato.
tika-s0101t0:24_1: Tathā lokasamudayaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento sammā gato atītoti sugato.
tika-s0101t0:24_2: Lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti sugato.
tika-s0101t0:24_3: Lokanirodhagāminipaṭipadaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti sugato.
tika-s0101t0:24_7: na paccāgacchatīti sugatotiādinā nayena ayamattho vibhāvetabbo.
tika-s0101t0:24_8: Atha vā sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ sammāsambodhiṃ nibbānameva vā gato adhigatoti sugato.
tika-s0101t0:24_9: Yasmā vā bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasañhitaṃ vineyyānaṃ yathārahaṃ kālayuttameva ca dhammaṃ bhāsati,
tika-s0101t0:25_3: tāhi sakalassāpi bhavagāmikammassa ariyamaggādhigamena avipākārahabhāvakaraṇena nivattitattā bhagavā pañcahipi gatīhi suṭṭhu mutto visaṃyuttoti āha –
tika-s0101t0:25_5: Etena bhagavato katthacipi gatiyā apariyāpannataṃ dasseti,
tika-s0101t0:28_0: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. ;
tika-s0101t0:29_0: Taṃtaṃgatisaṃvattanakānañhi kammakilesānaṃ aggamaggena bodhimūleyeva suppahīnattā natthi bhagavato gatipariyāpannatāti
tika-s0101t0:30_0: Atha vā gativimuttanti anupādisesanibbānadhātuppattiyā bhagavantaṃ thometi.
tika-s0101t0:30_1: Ettha hi dvīhākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā –
tika-s0101t0:30_10: Sā panettha āsayato payogato ca duvidhā parahitapaṭipatti,
tika-s0101t0:30_11: tividhā ca attahitasampatti pakāsitā hoti. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0101t0:30_18: “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti etena ca sabbāpi attahitasampattiparahitapaṭipatti pakāsitā hotīti.
tika-s0101t0:31_0: Atha vā tīhākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā – hetuto, phalato,
tika-s0101t0:31_9: Tāsu ñāṇappahānasampadā dutiyapadena saccappaṭivedhatthena ca sugata-
tika-s0101t0:31_14: Upakāro antaraṃ abāhiraṃ karitvā tividhayānamukhena vimuttidhammadesanā,
tika-s0101t0:32_1: Mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso hi bhagavā saṃsārapaṅkato sattānaṃ samuddharaṇatthaṃ katābhinīhāro anupubbena
tika-s0101t0:32_2: pāramiyo pūretvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ adhigatoti karuṇā sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:32_9: sassatucchedābhinivesādiantadvayarahitāya karuṇāpaññāpariggahitāya majjhimāya paṭipattiyā pakāsanato sugata- saddassa.
tika-s0101t0:32_15: tadubhayena attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu bhagavato catutthapuggalabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:33_0: Ettha ca karuṇāggahaṇena lokiyesu mahaggatabhāvappattāsādhāraṇaguṇadīpanato bhagavato sabbalokiyaguṇasampatti dassitā hoti,
tika-s0101t0:33_5: Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena lokasamaññānurūpaṃ bhagavato pavattiṃ dasseti,
tika-s0101t0:33_8: Sabhāvānavabodhena hi dhammānaṃ samaññaṃ atidhāvitvā sattādiparāmasanaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0101t0:33_22: sattasattati ñāṇavatthūnīti evamādīnaṃ anekesaṃ paññāppabhedānaṃ vasena ñāṇacāraṃ dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:34_20: Iti ādipariyosānadassanena sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti.
tika-s0101t0:34_21: Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena sīlakkhandhapubbaṅgamo samādhikkhandho dassito hoti.
tika-s0101t0:34_29: Evampi ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti,
tika-s0101t0:34_31: Eso eva hi niravasesato buddhaguṇānaṃ dassanupāyo,
tika-s0101t0:34_33: Aññathā ko nāma samattho bhagavato guṇe anupadaṃ niravasesato dassetuṃ.
tika-s0101t0:39_0: Teneva ca āyasmatā sāriputtattherenāpi buddhaguṇaparicchedanaṃ pati anuyuttena “no hetaṃ bhante”ti paṭikkhipitvā,
tika-s0101t0:39_1: “api ca me bhante dhammanvayo vidito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:40_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepena sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavantaṃ abhitthavitvā idāni saddhammaṃ thometuṃ “buddhopī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0101t0:41_2: bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”tiādinā niddesanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0101t0:41_6: Atha vā kassacipi ñeyyadhammassa anavabuddhassa abhāvena ñeyyavisesassa kammabhāvena aggahaṇato kammavacanicchāya
tika-s0101t0:41_7: abhāvena avagamanatthavaseneva kattuniddeso labbhatīti buddhavāti buddho,
tika-s0101t0:41_9: atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhūñāṇena saha vāsanāya vihataviddhastaniravasesakileso mahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiaparimeyya
tika-s0101t0:42_0: “Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi,
tika-s0101t0:43_2: tena “evaṃ guṇavisesayutto sopi nāma bhagavā”ti vakkhamānaguṇe dhamme sambhāvanaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0101t0:43_17: saṃsārato ca apatamāne katvā dhārayatīti dhammo.
tika-s0101t0:44_1: evaṃ vividhaguṇasamannāgato buddhopi bhagavā yaṃ ariyasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā,
tika-s0101t0:44_2: phalanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ pana sacchikatvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ adhigato,
tika-s0101t0:44_3: tametaṃ buddhānampi buddhabhāvahetubhūtaṃ sabbadosamalarahitaṃ attano uttaritarābhāvena anuttaraṃ paṭivedhasaddhammaṃ namāmīti.
tika-s0101t0:44_6: tīṇi piṭakāni sammasī”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā pariyattidhammassāpi sacchikiriyāsammasanapariyāyo labbhatīti sopi idha vutto yevāti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0101t0:44_8: sacchikatvā”ti ca vuttattā buddhakaradhammabhūtāhi pāramitāhi saha pubbabhāge adhisīlasikkhādayopi idha dhamma-
tika-s0101t0:44_12: Tathā hi sattānaṃ sakalavaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇāya katamahābhinīhāro mahākaruṇādhivāsapesalajjhāsayo paññāvisesapariyodātanimmalānaṃ
tika-s0101t0:44_13: dānadamasaññamādīnaṃ uttamadhammānaṃ satasahassādhikāni kappānaṃ cattāri asaṅkheyyāni sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ
tika-s0101t0:44_16: adhisīlaadhicittānaṃ paramukkaṃsapāramippatto bhagavā paccayākāre catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena mahāvajirañāṇaṃ
tika-s0101t0:45_0: Ettha ca “bhāvetvā”ti etena vijjāsampadāya dhammaṃ thometi,
tika-s0101t0:45_20: Atha vā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā buddhabhāvaṃ upagato”ti etena svākkhātatāya dhammaṃ thometi,
tika-s0101t0:46_5: Bhāvanāguṇena hi so dosānaṃ samugghātako hotīti.
tika-s0101t0:46_8: Tathā “bhāvetvā”ti etena saha pubbabhāgasīlādīhi sekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā dassitā honti,
tika-s0101t0:46_9: “sacchikatvā”ti etena saha asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā asekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā dassitā hontīti.
tika-s0101t0:47_6: tena kilesappahānameva bhagavato orasaputtabhāvakāraṇaṃ anujānātīti dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:47_8: tena ca satipi tesaṃ sattavisesabhāvena anekasatasahassasaṅkhyabhāve imaṃ gaṇanaparicchedaṃ nātivattantīti dasseti,
tika-s0101t0:47_12: tena asatipi ariyapuggalānaṃ kāyasāmaggiyaṃ ariyasaṅghabhāvaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0101t0:47_16: Yathā hi sattānaṃ orasaputtā attajātatāya pitusantakassa dāyajjassa visesena bhāgino honti,
tika-s0101t0:47_17: evametepi ariyapuggalā sammāsambuddhassa savanante ariyāya jātiyā jātatāya bhagavato santakassa vimuttisukhassa,
tika-s0101t0:47_18: ariyadhammaratanassa ca ekantabhāginoti orasā viya orasā.
tika-s0101t0:47_19: Atha vā bhagavato dhammadesanānubhāvena ariyabhūmiṃ okkamamānā,
tika-s0101t0:47_20: okkantā ca ariyasāvakā bhagavato urovāyāmajanitābhijātatāya nippariyāyena “orasaputtā”ti vattabbataṃ arahanti.
tika-s0101t0:47_21: Sāvakehi pavattiyamānāpi hi dhammadesanā bhagavato “dhammadesanā” icceva vuccati,
tika-s0101t0:48_0: Yadipi ariyasāvakānaṃ ariyamaggādhigamasamaye bhagavato viya tadantarāyakaraṇatthaṃ devaputtamāro,
tika-s0101t0:48_2: tehi pana apasādetabbatāya kāraṇe vimathite tepi vimathitā eva nāma hontīti āha –
tika-s0101t0:48_4: Imasmiṃ panatthe ‘māramārasenamathanāna’nti vattabbe “mārasenamathanāna”nti ekadesasarūpekaseso katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:48_5: Atha vā khandhābhisaṅkhāramārānaṃ viya devaputtamārassāpi guṇamāraṇe sahāyabhāvūpagamanato kilesabalakāyo “senā”ti vuccati. Yathāha –
tika-s0101t0:48_8: anantabhedā vā kilesavāhinī satidhammavicayavīriyasamathādiguṇapaharaṇehi odhiso vimathitā, vihatā,
tika-s0101t0:49_4: Atha vā sadevakena lokena “saraṇa”nti araṇīyato upagantabbato,
tika-s0101t0:49_10: Bhagavato aparabhāge buddhadhammaratanānampi samadhigamo saṅgharatanādhīnoti assa ariyasaṅghassa bahūpakārataṃ
tika-s0101t0:50_0: Ettha ca “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti etena ariyasaṅghassa pabhavasampadaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0101t0:50_7: Atha vā “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti ariyasaṅghassa visuddhanissayabhāvadīpanaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:50_11: Tathā “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti etena ariyasaṅghassa lokuttarasaraṇagamanasabbhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0101t0:50_12: Lokuttarasaraṇagamanena hi te bhagavato orasaputtā jātā.
tika-s0101t0:50_21: asekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo pariyosānanti ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā saṅkhepato sabbe ariyasaṅghaguṇā pakāsitā honti.
tika-s0101t0:51_0: Evaṃ gāthāttayena saṅkhepato sakalaguṇasaṅkittanamukhena ratanattayassa paṇāmaṃ katvā,
tika-s0101t0:51_1: idāni taṃ nipaccakāraṃ yathādhippete payojane pariṇāmento “iti me”tiādimāha.
tika-s0101t0:51_4: Tesañhi “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā yathābhūtaguṇe āvajjantassa amatādhigamahetubhūtaṃ anappakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjati. Yathāha –
tika-s0101t0:52_2: nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-s0101t0:52_5: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti tathāgataṃ ārabbha.
tika-s0101t0:56_0: Cittīkatabhāvādayo ca anaññasādhāraṇā buddhādīsu eva labbhantīti.
tika-s0101t0:56_4: Vandanā cettha kāyavācācittehi tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaninnatā,
tika-s0101t0:56_10: rattanattayassa ca khettabhāvasampattiyā taṃ puññaṃ atthappakāsanassa upaghātakaupaddavānaṃ vihanane samatthanti dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:57_4: etena “dīgho”ti ayaṃ imassa āgamassa atthānugatā samaññāti dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:57_14: āgamo ca so varo cāti āgamavaro,
tika-s0101t0:57_17: buddhānaṃ saccapaṭivedhaṃ anugamma paṭividdhasaccā aggasāvakādayo ariyā.
tika-s0101t0:57_20: Atha vā buddhā ca anubuddhā ca buddhānubuddhāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:57_21: Sammāsambuddheneva hi tiṇṇampi piṭakānaṃ atthavaṇṇanākkamo bhāsito,
tika-s0101t0:58_4: anuttariyasuttādīsu ca visesato buddhaguṇavibhāvanena ratanattaye sātisayappasādaṃ āvahati.
tika-s0101t0:58_6: yā taṃtaṃsaṃvaṇṇanāsu ādito tassa tassa saṃvaṇṇetabbassa dhammassa visesaguṇakittanena thomanā.
tika-s0101t0:58_8: ñāṇappabhedajananassa dhammakathikapuṅgavānaṃ vicittappaṭibhānajananassa tassa gambhīrañāṇehi ogāḷhassa
tika-s0101t0:59_11: Saṅgītāti atthaṃ pakāsetuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne “ayaṃ etassa attho,
tika-s0101t0:60_3: tesaṃ nivāsatāya tambapaṇṇidīpassa ca sīhaḷabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0101t0:60_6: Aparabhāge hi asaṅkaratthaṃ sīhaḷabhāsāya aṭṭhakathā ṭhapitāti.
tika-s0101t0:60_7: Tenassa mūlaṭṭhakathā sabbasādhāraṇā na hotīti idaṃ atthappakāsanaṃ ekantena karaṇīyanti dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:60_11: Dīpavāsīnanti vā sīhaḷadīpavāsīnaṃ atthāya sīhaḷabhāsāya ṭhapitāti yojanā.
tika-s0101t0:61_4: Sā hi sabhāvaniruttibhūtā paṇḍitānaṃ manaṃ ramayatīti.
tika-s0101t0:62_2: Aviruddhattā eva hi theravādāpi idha pakāsiyissanti.
tika-s0101t0:62_6: tappariyāpannā hutvā āgamādhigamasampannattā paññāpajjotena tassa samujjalanato theravaṃsapadīpā,
tika-s0101t0:62_10: Suṭṭhu nipuṇo saṇho vinicchayo etesanti sunipuṇavinicchayā.
tika-s0101t0:62_13: Suṭṭhu nipuṇo cheko vinicchayo etesanti sunipuṇavinicchayā,
tika-s0101t0:62_15: tatoyeva ca aviparīto saṇhasukhumo mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vinicchayoti tassa pamāṇabhūtataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:63_4: tena ca tambapaṇṇidīpavāsīnampi atthāyāti ayamattho siddho hoti,
tika-s0101t0:63_8: Idañhi atthappakāsanaṃ aviparītabyañjanasunikkhepassa atthasunayassa ca upāyabhāvato saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitiyā saṃvattati.
tika-s0101t0:64_2: dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṃvattanti.
tika-s0101t0:65_5: tadekadesabhāvena visuddhimaggo ca gahetabboti kathikānaṃ upadesaṃ karonto tattha vicāritadhamme uddesavasena dasseti “sīlakathā” tiādinā.
tika-s0101t0:65_9: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dveti niravasesāni yogakammassa bhāvanāya pavattiṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0101t0:66_1: Ñāṇavibhaṅgādīsu āgatanayena ekavidhādinā paññāya saṅkaletvā sampiṇḍetvā nicchayo paññāsaṅkalananicchayo.
tika-s0101t0:67_7: Paṭisambhidādīsu āgatanayaṃ avissajjetvāva vicāritattā avimuttatanti maggā.
tika-s0101t0:69_0: Idāni tasseva avicāraṇassa ekantakāraṇaṃ niddhārento “majjhe visuddhimaggo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0101t0:69_1: Tattha “majjhe ṭhatvā”ti etena majjhebhāvadīpanena visesato catunnaṃ āgamānaṃ sādhāraṇaṭṭhakathā visuddhimaggo,
tika-s0101t0:69_3: “Visesato”ti idaṃ vinayābhidhammānampi visuddhimaggo yathārahaṃ atthavaṇṇanā hoti yevāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:70_3: Ettha ca “sīhaḷadīpaṃ ābhatā”tiādinā atthappakāsanassa nimittaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0101t0:70_8: Sīlakathādīnaṃ avicāraṇampi hi idha karaṇappakāro evāti.
tika-s0101t0:73_0: Vibhāgavantānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgadassanavaseneva hotīti paṭhamaṃ tāva vaggasuttavasena vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha dīghāgamo nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0101t0:73_1: Tattha tatthāti “dīghassa āgamavarassa atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti yadidaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:73_4: so dīghāgamo nāma vaggasuttavasena evaṃ vibhāgoti attho.
tika-s0101t0:73_8: Attano saṃvaṇṇanāya paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyaṃ nikkhittānukkameneva pavattabhāvadassanatthaṃ “tassa vaggesu…pe…
tika-s0101t0:73_10: Kasmā pana catūsu āgamesu dīghāgamo paṭhamaṃ saṅgīto,
tika-s0101t0:73_14: api ca saddhāvahaguṇato dīghanikāyo paṭhamaṃ saṅgīto.
tika-s0101t0:73_30: Etena cassa vaggassa anvatthasaññatā vuttā hoti.
tika-s0101t0:73_31: Diṭṭhiviniveṭhanakathābhāvato pana suttantapiṭakassa niravasesadiṭṭhivibhajanaṃ brahmajālaṃ paṭhamaṃ nikkhittanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:73_32: Tepiṭake hi buddhavacane brahmajālasadisaṃ diṭṭhigatāni niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvā vibhattasuttaṃ natthīti.
tika-s0101t0:75_0: Yassā paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyaṃ nikkhittānukkamena saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo, taṃ,
tika-s0101t0:75_1: tassā ca tantiāruḷhāya idha vacane kāraṇaṃ dassento “paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti…pe…
tika-s0101t0:75_4: paññattattā ca vippakiṇṇānaṃ dhammavinayānaṃ saṅgahetvā gāyanaṃ kathanaṃ saṅgīti,
tika-s0101t0:75_6: antarantarā ca sambandhavasena ṭhapitaṃ saṅgītikāravacanaṃ saṅgahitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0101t0:75_12: Nidānanti ca desanaṃ desakālādivasena aviditaṃ viditaṃ katvā nidassetīti nidānaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:75_14: bodheyya”nti paṭiññāya anulomato veneyyānaṃ maggaphalappattīnaṃ hetubhūtā kiriyā nippariyāyena buddhakiccanti āha –
tika-s0101t0:75_18: dhammato anapetattā dhammañca taṃ cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:77_1: Nanu ca sāvakehi vinītāpi vineyyā bhagavatāyeva vinītā honti,
tika-s0101t0:77_4: Nāyaṃ doso tesaṃ vinayanupāyassa sāvakesu ṭhapitattā.
tika-s0101t0:78_2: yāva me bhikkhū na sāvakā bhavissanti viyattā vinītā visāradā bahussutā dhammadharā…pe…
tika-s0101t0:78_3: uppannaṃ parappavādaṃ saha dhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā sappāṭihāriyaṃ dhammaṃ desessa”ntiādi.
tika-s0101t0:79_2: Tathā hi manussabhāvassa supākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ mahābodhisattā carimabhave dārapariggahādīnipi karontīti.
tika-s0101t0:79_5: So pana upādi kilesābhisaṅkhāramāranimmathanena nibbānappattiyaṃ anossaṭṭho,
tika-s0101t0:79_6: idha khandhamaccumāranimmathanena ossaṭṭho nissesitoti ayaṃ anupādisesā,
tika-s0101t0:79_14: Atha vā dhātubhājanadivase sannipatitānaṃ kāyasāmaggīvasena sahitānanti attho.
tika-s0101t0:79_16: so pana saṅgho kiṃ parimāṇānanti āha –
tika-s0101t0:79_18: Niccasāpekkhatāya hi edisesu samāso hotiyeva, yathā –
tika-s0101t0:80_0: Āyasmā mahākassapo puna dullabhabhāvaṃ maññamāno bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesīti sambandho.
tika-s0101t0:80_1: “Dhātubhājanadivase sannipatitāna”nti idaṃ “bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesī”ti ettha “bhikkhūna”nti imināpi padena sambandhanīyaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:80_5: ciraṭṭhitikaṃ tassa kimaññaṃ āṇaṇyaṃ bhavissatī”ti etesaṃ padānaṃ “iti cintayanto”ti etena sambandho.
tika-s0101t0:81_3: tena “anuggahito pasaṃsito”ti ettha anuggaṇhanaṃ pasaṃsanañca parāmasati.
tika-s0101t0:81_5: saddaṃ ānetvā cīvare attanā sādhāraṇaparibhogenāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:81_6: Yassa yena hi sambandho dūraṭṭhampi ca tassa tanti atha vā bhagavatā cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogena bhagavatā anuggahitoti yojanīyaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:81_11: abhiññāvihāre vā ākaṅkhanto viharāmi ceva voharāmi ca,
tika-s0101t0:81_14: Na hi āyasmā mahākassapo bhagavā viya devasikaṃ catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhyā samāpattiyo samāpajjati,
tika-s0101t0:82_0: Tato paranti tato bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhajananato parato.
tika-s0101t0:82_2: yāva adhammo dhammaṃ paṭibāhituṃ samattho hoti,
tika-s0101t0:82_4: Āsanne anicchite hi ayaṃ pure- saddo.
tika-s0101t0:82_6: Puresaddasanniyogena hi anāgatatthe ayaṃ vattamānappayogo, yathā –
tika-s0101t0:83_1: ekūnapañcasate pariggahesī”ti etena sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavapariyantānaṃ yathāvuttapuggalānaṃ satipi
tika-s0101t0:83_2: āgamādhigamasabbhāve saha paṭisambhidāhi pana tevijjādiguṇayuttānaṃ āgamādhigamasampattiyā ukkaṃsagatattā
tika-s0101t0:83_6: samantapāsādikāyaṃ pana “asammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ nāma natthī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:83_7: taṃ “dve sahassāni bhikkhuto”ti vuttampi bhagavato santike paṭiggahitamevāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:83_10: Ānandattherassa navappāyāya parisāya vibbhamanena mahākassapatthero evamāha –
tika-s0101t0:83_14: “Kiñcāpi sekkho”ti idaṃ na sekkhānaṃ agatigamanasabbhāvena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:83_18: agatiṃ gantu”nti ca dhammasaṅgītiyā tassa yogyabhāvadassanena vijjamānaguṇakathanaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:84_4: Sattipañjaranti sattikhaggādihatthehi purisehi mallarājūnaṃ bhagavato dhātuārakkhakaraṇaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0101t0:84_5: Taṃ palibodhaṃ chinditvā taṃ karaṇīyaṃ karotūti saṅgāhakena chinditabbaṃ chinditvā ekantakaraṇīyaṃ karotūti attho.
tika-s0101t0:84_11: ‘sabbeheva piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo”’tiādinā saṃvegaṃ janesi.
tika-s0101t0:85_4: “Paṭhamaṃ āvuso upāli pārājikaṃ kattha paññatta”nti kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:85_5: nanu tassa saṅgītiyā purimakāle paṭhamabhāvo na yuttoti?
tika-s0101t0:85_7: bhagavatā paññattānukkamena pātimokkhuddesānukkamena ca paṭhamabhāvassa siddhattā.
tika-s0101t0:85_8: Yebhuyyena hi tīṇi piṭakāni bhagavato dharamānakāle ṭhitānukkameneva saṅgītāni,
tika-s0101t0:85_10: “Vatthumpi pucchī”tiādi ‘kattha paññatta’ntiādinā dassitena saha tadavasiṭṭhampi saṅgahetvā dassanavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:86_1: yebhuyyena ca dhammaniddesabhūte tādise abhidhammapiṭake saṅgaṇhituṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:86_3: nāpi paññattiniddesabhūte vinayapiṭaketi dīghabhāṇakā “jātakādīnaṃ abhidhammapiṭake saṅgaho”ti vadanti.
tika-s0101t0:86_6: Majjhimabhāṇakā pana “aṭṭhuppattivasena desitānaṃ jātakādīnaṃ yathānulomadesanābhāvato tādise suttantapiṭake saṅgaho yutto,
tika-s0101t0:86_7: na pana sabhāvadhammaniddesabhūte yathādhammasāsane abhidhammapiṭake”ti jātakādīnaṃ suttantapiṭakapariyāpannataṃ kathayanti.
tika-s0101t0:87_0: Evaṃ nimittapayojanakāladesakārakakaraṇappakārehi paṭhamaṃ saṅgītiṃ dassetvā idāni tattha vavatthāpitasiddhesu
tika-s0101t0:88_0: Kiñcāpi avisesena sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ kilesavinayanena vinayo,
tika-s0101t0:89_0: “Anekajātisaṃsāra”nti ayaṃ gāthā bhagavatā attano sabbaññutañāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ arahattappattiṃ paccavekkhantena
tika-s0101t0:89_5: ahaṃ imassa attabhāvagehassa kārakaṃ taṇhāvaḍḍhakiṃ gavesanto yena ñāṇena taṃ daṭṭhuṃ sakkā,
tika-s0101t0:89_6: tassa bodhiñāṇassatthāya dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhāro ettakaṃ kālaṃ anekajātisaṃsāraṃ anekajātisatasahassasaṅkhyaṃ
tika-s0101t0:89_7: saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ anibbisaṃ taṃ ñāṇaṃ avindanto alabhantoyeva sandhāvissaṃ saṃsariṃ.
tika-s0101t0:89_8: Yasmā jarāvyādhimaraṇamissatāya jāti nāmesā punappunaṃ upagantuṃ dukkhā,
tika-s0101t0:89_9: na ca sā tasmiṃ adiṭṭhe nivattati,
tika-s0101t0:89_11: Diṭṭhosīti idāni mayā sabbaññutañāṇaṃ paṭivijjhantena diṭṭho asi.
tika-s0101t0:89_12: Puna gehanti puna imaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ mama gehaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:89_15: Imassa tayā katassa attabhāvagehassa kūṭaṃ avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ kaṇṇikamaṇḍalaṃ visaṅkhataṃ viddhaṃsitaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:89_16: Visaṅkhāraṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena gataṃ anupaviṭṭhaṃ idāni mama cittaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:89_17: ahañca taṇhānaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattamaggaṃ ajjhagā adhigato pattosmīti.
tika-s0101t0:89_19: “Yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā”ti ayaṃ pana vācāya pavattitadhammānaṃ ādīti vadanti.
tika-s0101t0:89_23: Visākhapuṇṇamāyameva hi bhagavā paccūsasamaye sabbaññutaṃ pattoti.
tika-s0101t0:90_0: Vayadhammāti aniccalakkhaṇamukhena dukkhānattalakkhaṇampi saṅkhārānaṃ vibhāveti “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:90_2: Lakkhaṇattayavibhāvananayeneva ca tadārammaṇaṃ vipassanaṃ dassento sabbatitthiyānaṃ avisayabhūtaṃ buddhāveṇikaṃ
tika-s0101t0:90_5: Atha vā “vayadhammā saṅkhārā”ti etena saṅkhepena saṃvejetvā “appamādena sampādethā”ti saṅkhepeneva niravasesaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:90_6: Appamādapadañhi sikkhāttayasaṅgahitaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ sāsanaṃ pariyādiyitvā tiṭṭhatīti.
tika-s0101t0:91_3: Paṭhamasaṅgītito puretarameva hi āyasmatā ānandena jetavane viharantena subhassa māṇavassa bhāsitanti.
tika-s0101t0:93_0: Attatthaparatthādibhedeti yo taṃ suttaṃ sajjhāyati, suṇāti, vāceti, cinteti,
tika-s0101t0:93_5: Tathā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ lokiyalokuttarañcāti evamādibhede atthe ādi-
tika-s0101t0:93_12: Suttena ca yo attho pakāsito so tasseva hotīti,
tika-s0101t0:93_14: tena sūcetabbassa paratthassa nivattetabbassa abhāvā atthagahaṇañca na kattabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:93_15: Attatthaparatthavinimmuttassa bhāsitatthassa abhāvā ādiggahaṇañca na kattabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:93_16: Tasmā yathāvuttassa hitapariyāyassa atthassa sutte asambhavato suttadhārassa puggalassa vasena attatthaparatthā vuttā.
tika-s0101t0:94_0: Atha vā suttaṃ anapekkhitvā ye attatthādayo atthappabhedā vuttā “na haññadatthatthipasaṃsalābhā”ti etassa padassa niddese “attattho, parattho,
tika-s0101t0:94_16: Ettha hi purimakā pañca atthappabhedā hitapariyāyā,
tika-s0101t0:94_21: Mūludakādayo viya paṃsunā akkharasannivesādinā tirohito paṭicchanno.
tika-s0101t0:94_28: Atha vā “attanā ca appiccho hotī”ti attatthaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:94_30: Evaṃ “attanā ca pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hotī”tiādi suttāni yojetabbāni.
tika-s0101t0:94_33: Tasmā veneyyajjhāsayavasappavattāya desanāya attahitaparahitatādīni sātisayaṃ pakāsitāni hoti tapparabhāvato,
tika-s0101t0:94_34: na āṇādhammasabhāvavasappavattāyāti idameva ca “atthānaṃ sūcanato sutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:95_0: Sutte ca āṇādhammasabhāvā ca veneyyajjhāsayaṃ anuvattanti,
tika-s0101t0:95_2: Tasmā veneyyānaṃ ekantahitapaṭilābhasaṃvattanikā suttantadesanā hotīti “suvuttā cetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:95_4: “Suttāṇā”ti etassa atthaṃ pakāsetuṃ “suṭṭhu ca ne tāyatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:96_3: abhikkantenāti ettha kantiyā adhikattaṃ visiṭṭhatanti yuttaṃ kiriyāvisesakattā upasaggassa.
tika-s0101t0:96_4: Abhirājā abhivinayeti pana pūjitaparicchinnesu rājavinayesu abhi-
tika-s0101t0:96_10: saddo yathā saha sādhanena kiriyaṃ vadatīti abhirājaabhivinaya-
tika-s0101t0:96_13: saddo saha sādhanena vuḍḍhiyādikiriyaṃ dīpetīti ayamattho dassitoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0101t0:98_0: Kathetabbānaṃ atthānaṃ desakāyattena āṇādividhinā atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanā.
tika-s0101t0:98_2: Kathetabbassa saṃvarāsaṃvarādino atthassa kathanaṃ vacanapaṭibaddhatākaraṇaṃ kathā.
tika-s0101t0:98_6: saddo visuṃ visuṃ yojetabbo “desanābhedaṃ sāsanabhedaṃ kathābhedañca yathārahaṃ paridīpaye”ti.
tika-s0101t0:98_8: Sikkhā ca pahānāni ca gambhīrabhāvo ca sikkhāppahānagambhīrabhāvaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:98_10: Ettha yathāti upārambhanissaraṇadhammakosarakkhaṇahetupariyāpuṇanaṃ suppaṭipatti duppaṭipattīti etehi pakārehi.
tika-s0101t0:101_2: Na hi kālabhedena dhammānaṃ sabhāvabhedo atthīti.
tika-s0101t0:101_6: Te pana amhehi asammohantaradhānasuttaṭīkāyaṃ vibhāgato dassitā,
tika-s0101t0:102_0: Tīsupi cetesu ete dhammatthadesanā paṭivedhāti ettha tantiattho tantidesanā tantiatthapaṭivedho ca tantivisayā
tika-s0101t0:102_2: piṭakāni pana tanti yevāti tesaṃ dhammādhārabhāvo kathaṃ yujjeyyāti?
tika-s0101t0:102_4: Avayavassa hi samudāyo ādhārabhāvena vuccati, yathā –
tika-s0101t0:102_6: Dhammādīnañca dukkhogāhabhāvato tehi vinayādayo gambhīrāti vinayādīnañca catubbidho gambhīrabhāvo vutto.
tika-s0101t0:102_14: desanāñāṇassa dukkarabhāvato desanāya ca dukkhogāhabhāvo veditabbo,
tika-s0101t0:103_0: “Hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti etena vacanena dhammassa hetubhāvo kathaṃ ñātabboti?
tika-s0101t0:103_1: “Dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti etassa samāsapadassa avayavapadatthaṃ dassentena “hetumhi ñāṇa”nti vuttattā.
tika-s0101t0:103_2: “Dhamme paṭisambhidā”ti ettha hi “dhamme”ti etassa atthaṃ dassentena “hetumhī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:103_7: saddā cāti imamatthaṃ vadantena sādhito dhammassa hetubhāvo,
tika-s0101t0:104_7: Desanāpi hi paṭivedho viya aviparītasavisayavibhāvanato dhammānurūpaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0101t0:104_10: etena “tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā”ti ettha vuttaṃ sabhāvadhammaniruttiṃ dasseti,
tika-s0101t0:104_12: Tathā hi niruttipaṭisambhidāya parittārammaṇādibhāvo paṭisambhidāvibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ vutto.
tika-s0101t0:104_13: Aṭṭhakathāyañca “taṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā”tiādinā saddārammaṇatā dassitā.
tika-s0101t0:104_14: “Imassa atthassa ayaṃ saddo vācako”ti vacanavacanīye vavatthapetvā taṃtaṃvacanīya vibhāvanavasena pavattito hi saddo desanāti.
tika-s0101t0:104_15: “Anulomādivasena vā kathana”nti etena tassā dhammaniruttiyā abhilāpaṃ kathanaṃ tassa vacanassa pavattanaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:104_16: “Adhippāyo”ti etena “desanāti paññattī”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ dhammaniruttābhilāpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:105_0: Nanu ca “dhammo tantī”ti imasmiṃ pakkhe dhammassa saddasabhāvattā dhammadesanānaṃ viseso na siyāti? Na,
tika-s0101t0:105_2: uggahaṇādivasena ca pubbe vavatthāpito saddappabandho dhammo,
tika-s0101t0:105_3: pacchā paresaṃ avabodhanatthaṃ pavattito tadatthappakāsako saddo desanāti.
tika-s0101t0:105_9: “So ca lokiyalokuttaro”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ abhisamayaṃ yena pakārena abhisameti,
tika-s0101t0:105_12: tehi pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “visayato asammohato ca atthānurūpaṃ dhammesū”tiādimāha.
tika-s0101t0:105_13: Tattha hi visayato atthādianurūpaṃ dhammādīsu avabodho avijjādidhammasaṅkhārādiatthatadubhayapaññāpanārammaṇo lokiyo abhisamayo,
tika-s0101t0:105_14: asammohato atthādianurūpaṃ dhammādīsu avabodho nibbānārammaṇo maggasampayutto yathāvuttadhammatthapaññattīsu
tika-s0101t0:105_16: Abhisamayato aññampi paṭivedhatthaṃ dassetuṃ “tesaṃ tesaṃ vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0101t0:105_18: ‘paṭivijjhīyatīti paṭivedho’ti iminā taṃtaṃrūpādidhammānaṃ aviparītasabhāvo ca “paṭivedho”ti vuccatīti.
tika-s0101t0:106_0: Yathāvuttehi dhammādīhi piṭakānaṃ gambhīrabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “idāni yasmā etesu piṭakesū”tiādimāha.
tika-s0101t0:106_1: Yo cetthāti etesu taṃtaṃpiṭakagatesu dhammādīsu yo paṭivedho,
tika-s0101t0:106_2: etesu ca piṭakesu tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ yo aviparītasabhāvoti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:107_5: nijjhāyitvā paññāya disvā rocetvā gahetabbā na hontīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0101t0:107_7: Vādappamokkhānisaṃsā attano upari parehi āropitavādassa niggahassa pamokkhappayojanā hutvā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti,
tika-s0101t0:107_9: Yassa catthāyāti yassa ca sīlādipūraṇassa anupādāvimokkhassa vā atthāya dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti ñāyena pariyāpuṇantīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0101t0:107_12: Tesaṃ te dhammā duggahitattā upārambhamānadabbamakkhapalāsādihetubhāvena dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti.
tika-s0101t0:107_16: Aññatthaṃ anapekkhitvā bhaṇḍāgārikasseva sato pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti.
tika-s0101t0:108_0: “Tāsaṃyevā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ pāpuṇitabbānaṃ chaḷabhiññācatuppaṭisambhidādīnaṃ vinaye pabhedavacanābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:108_2: Dutiye pana “tāsaṃyevā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ catasso paṭisambhidā apekkhitvā kataṃ,
tika-s0101t0:108_4: Tā hi chasu abhiññāsu antogadhāti sutte vibhattā yevāti.
tika-s0101t0:109_2: yathā tadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati anañña”ntiādinā.
tika-s0101t0:114_0: Sabbassāpi hi buddhavacanassa suttanti ayaṃ sāmaññavidhi.
tika-s0101t0:114_4: sakavāde pañcasuttasatānī”ti evamādi ca etassa atthassa sādhakaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:115_0: Visesavidhayo pare sanimittā tadekadesesu geyyādayo visesavidhayo tena tena nimittena patiṭṭhitā.
tika-s0101t0:115_2: Lokepi hi sasilokaṃ sagāthakaṃ cuṇṇiyaganthaṃ ‘geyya’nti vadanti.
tika-s0101t0:115_3: Gāthāvirahe pana sati pucchaṃ katvā vissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimittaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:115_6: Evaṃ sante sagāthakādīnampi pucchaṃ katvā vissajjanavasena pavattānaṃ veyyākaraṇabhāvo āpajjatīti?
tika-s0101t0:115_13: abbhutadhammapaṭisaṃyuttesu ca suttavisesesu yathākkamaṃ gāthāudānaitivuttakaabbhutadhammasaññā patiṭṭhitā,
tika-s0101t0:115_14: tathā satipi gāthābandhabhāve bhagavato atītāsu jātīsu cariyānubhāvappakāsakesu jātakasaññā,
tika-s0101t0:115_16: sagāthakatte ca kesuci suttantesu vedassa labhāpanato vedallasaññā patiṭṭhitāti evaṃ tena tena sagāthakattādinā
tika-s0101t0:115_17: nimittena tesu tesu suttavisesesu geyyādisaññā patiṭṭhitāti visesavidhayo suttaṅgato pare geyyādayo.
tika-s0101t0:115_21: niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ veyyākaraṇanti suttaṅgaṃ na sambhavatīti codanā tadavatthā vāti?
tika-s0101t0:115_24: Sodhitañhi pubbe gāthāvirahe sati pucchāvissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimittanti.
tika-s0101t0:116_1: “gāthābhāvato maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā”ti, taṃ na,
tika-s0101t0:116_4: Na hi tāni dhammapadabuddhavaṃsādayo viya gāthābhāvena paññātāni,
tika-s0101t0:116_13: na ca maṅgalasuttādīsu kathāvinimutto koci suttapadeso atthi,
tika-s0101t0:116_15: na ca samudāyo nāma koci atthi,
tika-s0101t0:116_17: “ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu sagāthakappadesānaṃ geyyaṅgasaṅgaho siyā”ti tadapi na, aññato.
tika-s0101t0:116_18: Aññā eva hi tā gāthā jātakādipariyāpannattā.
tika-s0101t0:117_2: imāni caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānī”ti buddhavacanaṃ dhammavinayādibhedena vavatthapetvā saṅgāyantena
tika-s0101t0:117_3: mahākassapappamukhena vasigaṇena anekacchariyapātubhāvapaṭimaṇḍitāya saṅgītiyā imassa dīghāgamassa paṭhamamajjhimabuddhavacanādibhāvo
tika-s0101t0:119_0: Evaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiṃ dassetvā yadatthaṃ sā idha dassitā,
tika-s0101t0:120_1: Ettāvatā ca brahmajālassa sādhāraṇato bāhiranidānaṃ dassetvā idāni abbhantaranidānaṃ saṃvaṇṇetuṃ “tattha eva”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:120_2: Atha vā chahi ākārehi saṃvaṇṇanā kātabbā sambandhato padato padavibhāgato padatthato anuyogato parihārato cāti.
tika-s0101t0:120_6: nidānapāḷiyā pana saṅgītivasena veditabboti paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiṃ dassentena nidānapāḷiyā sambandhassa
tika-s0101t0:120_10: na vā vattabbo tesaṃ nayaggahaṇena gahitattā,
tika-s0101t0:120_16: Atha vā padāni ca padavibhāgo ca padavibhāgo,
tika-s0101t0:120_17: padaviggaho ca padavibhāgo ca padavibhāgoti vā ekasesavasena padapadaviggahāpi padavibhāga saddena vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:121_1: Taṃ pana padatthaṃ atthuddhārakkamena paṭhamaṃ evaṃ-
tika-s0101t0:121_18: āmuttamālābharaṇā odātavatthavasanā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā samaṅgībhūtā paricārenti,
tika-s0101t0:121_20: No hidaṃ bho gotamā”ti ca ādīsu pucchāyaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:121_26: saddena pucchanākāraparimāṇākārānaṃ vuttattā ākārattho eva evaṃ- saddo ti? Na,
tika-s0101t0:121_29: yathā “evaṃ byākhotiādīsu pana na ākāravisesavācako evañca katvā “evaṃ jātena maccenā”tiādīni upamādīsu udāharaṇāni upapannāni honti.
tika-s0101t0:121_32: sobhāsugandhatādiguṇayogato mālāguṇasadisiyo pahūtā puññakiriyā maritabbasabhāvatāya maccena sattena
tika-s0101t0:121_37: So pana upamākāro niyamiyamāno atthato upamāva hotīti āha “upamāyaṃ āgato”ti.
tika-s0101t0:122_0: Tathā evaṃ iminā ākārena “abhikkamitabba”ntiādinā upadisiyamānāya samaṇasāruppāya ākappasampattiyā yo tattha upadisanākāro,
tika-s0101t0:122_4: evametaṃ sugatāti ettha ca bhagavatā yathāvuttamatthaṃ aviparītato jānantehi kataṃ tattha saṃvijjamānaguṇānaṃ
tika-s0101t0:122_8: So ca garahaṇākāro “vasalī”tiādi khuṃsanasaddasannidhānato idha evaṃ-
tika-s0101t0:122_11: evaṃ upamākārādayopi upamādivasena vuttānaṃ puppharāsiādisaddānaṃ sannidhānatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:122_13: evaṃ samaṇaṃ ānandaṃ vadehī”ti vadanākāro idāni vattabbo evaṃ-
tika-s0101t0:122_15: Evaṃ noti etthāpi tesaṃ yathāvuttadhammānaṃ ahitadukkhāvahabhāve sanniṭṭhānajananatthaṃ anumatiggahaṇavasena “saṃvattanti, no vā,
tika-s0101t0:122_16: kathaṃ vā ettha hotī”ti pucchāya katāya “evaṃ no ettha hotī”ti vuttattā tadākārasanniṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ-
tika-s0101t0:122_18: so pana tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanākāro niyamiyamāno avadhāraṇattho hotīti āha “evaṃ no ettha hotīti ādīsu avadhāraṇe”ti.
tika-s0101t0:122_19: Evaṃ bhanteti pana dhammassa sādhukaṃ savanamanasikāre sanniyojitehi bhikkhūhi attano tattha ṭhitabhāvassa paṭijānanavasena vuttattā ettha evaṃ-
tika-s0101t0:123_1: nandiyāvaṭṭa tipukkhalasīhavikkīḷitaaṅkusadisālocanasaṅkhātā vā ādhārādibhedavasena nānāvidhā nayā nānānayā,
tika-s0101t0:123_4: khandhādivasena saṅgahādivasena samayavimuttādivasena ṭhapanādivasena kusalamūlādivasena tikapaṭṭhānādivasena
tika-s0101t0:123_10: attajjhāsayādayo eva vā samuṭṭhānaṃ uppattihetu etassāti anekajjhāsayasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:123_13: akkharapadabyañjanākāraniruttiniddesavasena chahi byañjanapadehi ca samannāgatanti vā attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0101t0:124_0: Vividhapāṭihāriyanti ettha pāṭihāriyapadassa vacanatthaṃ “paṭipakkhaharaṇato rāgādikilesāpanayanato pāṭihāriya”nti vadanti.
tika-s0101t0:124_1: Bhagavato pana paṭipakkhā rāgādayo na santi,
tika-s0101t0:124_3: Puthujjanānampi vigatūpakkilese aṭṭhaguṇasamannāgate citte hatapaṭipakkhe iddhividhaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0101t0:124_4: tasmā tattha pavattavohārena ca na sakkā idha “pāṭihāriya”nti vattuṃ.
tika-s0101t0:124_5: Sace pana mahākāruṇikassa bhagavato veneyyagatā ca kilesā paṭipakkhā,
tika-s0101t0:124_8: Atha vā bhagavato ca sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhā titthiyā,
tika-s0101t0:124_11: diṭṭhippakāsane asamatthabhāvena ca iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi haritā apanītā hontīti.
tika-s0101t0:124_12: “Paṭī”ti vā ayaṃ saddo “pacchā”ti etassa atthaṃ bodheti “tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi,
tika-s0101t0:124_15: vigatūpakkilese ca katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti paṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:124_16: attano vā upakkilesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchā haraṇaṃ paṭihāriyaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:124_19: haritesu ca attano upakkilesesu parasattānaṃ upakkilesaharaṇāni hontīti paṭihāriyāni bhavanti.
tika-s0101t0:124_21: Paṭihāriye vā iddhiādesanānusāsanīsamudāye bhavaṃ ekekaṃ “pāṭihāriya”nti vuccati.
tika-s0101t0:124_22: Paṭihāriyaṃ vā catutthajjhānaṃ maggo ca paṭipakkhaharaṇato,
tika-s0101t0:124_26: Tassa pana iddhiādibhedena visayabhedena ca bahuvidhassa bhagavato desanāya labbhamānattā āha “vividhapāṭihāriya”nti.
tika-s0101t0:125_0: Na aññathāti bhagavato sammukhā sutākārato na aññathāti attho,
tika-s0101t0:125_3: Evañca katvā “sabbappakārena ko samattho viññātu”nti idaṃ vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0101t0:125_5: Na hettha atthantaratāparihāro dvinnampi atthānaṃ ekavisayattā,
tika-s0101t0:125_6: itarathā thero bhagavato desanāya sabbathā paṭiggahaṇe samattho asamattho cāti āpajjeyyāti.
tika-s0101t0:126_1: so attā”ti evaṃ vuttāya niyakajjhattasaṅkhātāya sasantatiyaṃ vattanato tividhopi me-
tika-s0101t0:127_2: saddo eva taṃ tamatthaṃ anuvadatīti anupasaggassa suta-
tika-s0101t0:127_3: saddassa atthuddhāre saupasaggassa gahaṇaṃ na virujjhatīti dassento “saupasaggo ca anupasaggo cā”ti āha.
tika-s0101t0:127_6: sadde sambhavantīti vuttaṃ “upadhāritanti vā upadhāraṇanti vā attho”ti.
tika-s0101t0:127_7: Mayāti atthe satīti yadā mesaddassa kattuvasena karaṇaniddeso,
tika-s0101t0:127_9: Mamāti atthe satīti yadā sambandhavasena sāminiddeso, tadā.
tika-s0101t0:128_0: Sutasaddasannidhāne payuttena evaṃsaddena savanakiriyājotakena bhavitabbanti vuttaṃ “evanti sotaviññāṇādiviññāṇakiccanidassana”nti. Ādi-
tika-s0101t0:128_1: saddena sampaṭicchanādīnaṃ pañcadvārikaviññāṇānaṃ tadabhinihaṭānañca manodvārikaviññāṇānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:128_2: Sabbesampi vākyānaṃ evakāratthasahitattā “suta”nti etassa sutaṃ evāti ayamattho labbhatīti āha “assavanabhāvapaṭikkhepato”ti,
tika-s0101t0:128_4: Yathā ca sutaṃ sutaṃ evāti niyametabbaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:128_6: Atha vā “saddantaratthāpohanavasena saddo atthaṃ vadatī”ti sutanti asutaṃ na hotīti ayametassa atthoti vuttaṃ “assavanabhāvapaṭikkhepato”ti,
tika-s0101t0:128_15: sadde ayaṃ atthayojanā karīyatīti tadapekkhassa suta-
tika-s0101t0:129_0: Evaṃ savanahetusuṇantapuggalasavanavisesavasena padattayassa ekena pakārena atthayojanaṃ dassetvā idāni
tika-s0101t0:129_2: Tattha tassāti yā sā bhagavato sammukhā dhammassavanākārena pavattā manodvāraviññāṇavīthi, tassā.
tika-s0101t0:129_3: Sā hi nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattituṃ samatthā.
tika-s0101t0:129_9: “Sutanti dhammappakāsana”nti yasmiṃ ārammaṇe vuttappakārā viññāṇavīthi nānappakārena pavattā,
tika-s0101t0:130_3: saddena sakalampi suttaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti dasseti. Suta-
tika-s0101t0:130_5: savanakiriyāya ca sādhāraṇaviññāṇappabandhapaṭibaddhattā tattha ca puggalavohāroti vuttaṃ “sutanti puggalakiccappakāsana”nti.
tika-s0101t0:130_6: Na hi puggalavohārarahite dhammappabandhe savanakiriyā labbhatīti.
tika-s0101t0:131_1: saddaṃ gahetvā purimayojanāya aññathā atthayojanaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:131_4: “Sutanti visayaniddeso”ti sotabbabhūto dhammo savanakiriyākattupuggalassa savanakiriyāvasena pavattiṭṭhānanti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:131_5: Cittasantānavinimuttassa paramatthato kassaci kattu abhāvepi saddavohārena buddhiparikappitabhedavacanicchāya
tika-s0101t0:131_6: cittasantānato aññaṃ viya taṃsamaṅgiṃ katvā vuttaṃ “cittasantānena taṃsamaṅgino”ti.
tika-s0101t0:131_7: Savanakiriyāvisayopi sotabbadhammo savanakiriyāvasena pavattacittasantānassa idha paramatthato kattubhāvato,
tika-s0101t0:131_8: savanavasena cittappavattiyā eva vā savanakiriyābhāvato taṃkiriyākattu ca visayo hotīti katvā vuttaṃ “taṃsamaṅgino kattu visaye”ti.
tika-s0101t0:131_11: saddaṃ gahetvā ayaṃ atthayojanā katāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:132_0: Pubbe sutānaṃ nānāvihitānaṃ suttasaṅkhātānaṃ atthabyañjanānaṃ upadhāritarūpassa ākārassa nidassanassa avadhāraṇassa vā pakāsanasabhāvo evaṃ-
tika-s0101t0:132_1: saddoti tadākārādiupadhāraṇassa puggalapaññattiyā upādānabhūtadhammappabandhabyāpāratāya vuttaṃ “evanti puggalakiccaniddeso”ti.
tika-s0101t0:132_2: Savanakiriyā pana puggalavādinopi viññāṇanirapekkhā natthīti visesato viññāṇabyāpāroti āha “sutanti viññāṇakiccaniddeso”ti.
tika-s0101t0:132_4: viññāṇakiccassa ca tattheva samodahitabbato “meti ubhayakiccayuttapuggalaniddeso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:132_7: saddānaṃ atthāti te tathārūpapaññattiupādānabyāpārabhāvena dassento āha “evanti puggalakiccaniddeso.
tika-s0101t0:133_1: sabbapaññattīnañca vijjamānādivasena chasu paññattibhedesu antogadhattā tesu “eva”ntiādīnaṃ paññattīnaṃ
tika-s0101t0:133_2: sarūpaṃ niddhārento āha “evanti ca meti cā”tiādi.
tika-s0101t0:133_3: Tattha evanti ca meti ca vuccamānassa atthassa ākārādino,
tika-s0101t0:133_6: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hotiyo māyāmarīciādayo viya abhūtattho,
tika-s0101t0:133_7: anussavādīhi gahetabbo viya anuttamattho ca na hoti,
tika-s0101t0:133_13: Teneva hi “yañhi tamettha sotena upaladdha”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:133_15: Taṃ taṃ upādāya vattabbatoti sotapathaṃ āgate dhamme upādāya tesaṃ upadhāritākārādino paccāmasanavasena “eva”nti,
tika-s0101t0:133_17: Diṭṭhādisabhāvarahite saddāyatane pavattamānopi sutavohāro “dutiyaṃ tatiya”ntiādiko viya paṭhamādīni
tika-s0101t0:133_18: diṭṭhamutaviññāte apekkhitvā pavattoti āha “diṭṭhādīni upanidhāya vattabbato”ti.
tika-s0101t0:133_19: Asutaṃ na hotīti hi “suta”nti pakāsito yamatthoti.
tika-s0101t0:134_0: Attanā paṭividdhā suttassa pakāravisesā “eva”nti therena paccāmaṭṭhāti āha “asammohaṃ dīpetī”ti.
tika-s0101t0:134_1: “Nānappakārapaṭivedhasamattho hotī”ti etena vakkhamānassa suttassa nānappakārataṃ duppaṭivijjhatañca dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:134_2: “Sutassa asammosaṃ dīpetī”ti sutākārassa yāthāvato dassiyamānattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:134_7: yathāsutadhāraṇameva tattha karaṇīyanti satiyā byāpāro adhiko,
tika-s0101t0:134_8: paññā tattha guṇībhūtāti vuttaṃ “paññāpubbaṅgamāyā”tiādi paññāya pubbaṅgamāti katvā.
tika-s0101t0:134_10: pubbaṅgamatāya vā cakkhuviññāṇādīsu āvajjanādīnaṃ viya appadhānatte paññā pubbaṅgamā etissāti ayampi attho yujjati,
tika-s0101t0:134_14: akkharapadabyañjanākāraniruttiniddesavasena chahi byañjanapadehi ca samannāgatassāti vā attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0101t0:135_2: “Avikkhepaṃ dīpetī”ti “brahmajālaṃ kattha bhāsita”ntiādi pucchāvasena pakaraṇappattassa vakkhamānassa
tika-s0101t0:135_3: suttassa savanaṃ samādhānamantarena na sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:135_7: saddhammassavanena viya ca avikkhepassa yathā yonisomanasikārena phalabhūtena attasammāpaṇidhipubbekatapuññatānaṃ siddhi vuttā tadavinābhāvato,
tika-s0101t0:135_8: evaṃ avikkhepena phalabhūtena kāraṇabhūtānaṃ saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayānaṃ siddhi dassetabbā siyā assutavato,
tika-s0101t0:136_0: “Na hi vikkhittacitto”tiādinā samatthanavacanena pana avikkhepena kāraṇabhūtena sappurisūpanissayena
tika-s0101t0:136_2: Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo yutto siyāsaddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayā na ekantena avikkhepassa kāraṇaṃ bāhiraṅgattā,
tika-s0101t0:136_3: avikkhepo pana sappurisūpanissayo viya saddhammassavanassa ekantakāraṇanti.
tika-s0101t0:136_5: no na samatthitā vikkhittacittānaṃ sappurisapayirupāsanābhāvassa atthasiddhattā.
tika-s0101t0:136_6: Ettha ca purimaṃ phalena kāraṇassa siddhidassanaṃ nadīpūrena viya upari vuṭṭhisabbhāvassa,
tika-s0101t0:136_7: dutiyaṃ kāraṇena phalassa siddhidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ ekantena vassinā viya meghavuṭṭhānena vuṭṭhippavattiyā.
tika-s0101t0:137_10: Sammāpaṇihitatto pubbe ca katapuñño suddhāsayo hoti tadasuddhihetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ dūrībhāvatoti āha “āsayasuddhi siddhā hotī”ti.
tika-s0101t0:137_14: padhānaṃ anuyuñja khippaṃ hohisi anāsavoti ca.
tika-s0101t0:137_19: Parisuddhakāyavacīpayogo hi vippaṭisārābhāvato avikkhittacitto pariyattiyaṃ visārado hotīti.
tika-s0101t0:138_6: vakkhamānāpekkhāya vā sāmaññeneva sotabbadhammavisesaṃ āmasatīti dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:138_7: Manodiṭṭhikaraṇāpariyattidhammānaṃ anupekkhanasuppaṭivedhā visesato manasikārapaṭibaddhāti te vuttanayena yonisomanasikāradīpakena evaṃ-
tika-s0101t0:138_9: savanadhāraṇavacīparicayā pariyattidhammānaṃ visesena sotāvadhānapaṭibaddhāti te avikkhepadīpakena suta-
tika-s0101t0:138_10: saddena yojetvā dassento sāsanasampattiyā dhammassavane ussāhaṃ janeti.
tika-s0101t0:138_15: ettakā ettha anusandhiyo”tiādinā nayena manasā anupekkhitā.
tika-s0101t0:138_17: ñātapariññāsaṅkhātāya vā diṭṭhiyā tattha tattha vuttarūpārūpadhamme “iti rūpaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:139_0: “Sakalena vacanenā”ti pubbe tīhi padehi visuṃ visuṃ yojitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:139_1: Asappurisabhūminti akataññutaṃ “idhekacco pāpabhikkhu tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā
tika-s0101t0:139_5: mahākassapattherādīnañca tadāsaṅkāya abhāvato asappurisabhūmisamatikkamādivacanaṃ niratthakaṃ ti?
tika-s0101t0:139_6: Nayidaṃ evaṃ “evaṃ me suta”nti vadantena ayampi attho vibhāvitoti dassanato.
tika-s0101t0:139_7: Keci pana “devatānaṃ parivitakkāpekkhaṃ tathāvacananti edisī codanā anavakāsā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0101t0:139_8: Tasmiṃ kira khaṇe ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “tathāgato ca parinibbuto,
tika-s0101t0:139_12: kiṃ nu kho sayaṃ sacchikata dhammaṃ deseti,
tika-s0101t0:140_5: Ettha ca paṭhamādayo tisso atthayojanā ākārādiatthesu aggahitavisesameva evaṃ-
tika-s0101t0:140_9: Pacchimā pana tisso yathākkamaṃ ākāratthaṃ nidassanatthaṃ avadhāraṇatthañca evaṃ-
tika-s0101t0:141_3: idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti ittheke abhivadantī”tiādīsu aññatthe dissati,
tika-s0101t0:141_6: “ekova kho bhikkhave khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu saṅkhyayaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:141_17: Tattha hi nisinnā titthiyā attano attano samayaṃ pavadantīti.
tika-s0101t0:141_20: abhisamayo atthoti abhisamayaṭṭhoti pīḷana ādīni abhisametabbabhāvena ekībhāvaṃ upanetvā vuttāni.
tika-s0101t0:141_21: Abhisamayassa vā paṭivedhassa visayabhūtabhāvo abhisamayaṭṭhoti tāneva tathā ekattena vuttāni.
tika-s0101t0:141_22: Tattha pīḷanaṃ dukkhasaccassa taṃ samaṅgīno hiṃsanaṃ avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:142_0: Tattha sahakārīkāraṇaṃ sannijjha sameti samavetīti samayo, samavāyo.
tika-s0101t0:142_1: Sameti samāgacchati maggabrahmacariyamettha tadādhārapuggalehīti samayo, khaṇo.
tika-s0101t0:142_6: Dhammappavattimattatāya atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:142_7: karaṇaṃ viya ca kappanāmattasiddhena rūpena voharīyatīti. Samaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:142_8: saha vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ pavatti avaṭṭhānanti samayo, samūho,
tika-s0101t0:142_11: Avasesapaccayānaṃ samāgame eti phalaṃ etasmā uppajjati pavattati cāti samayo,
tika-s0101t0:142_13: Sameti saṃyojanabhāvato sambandho eti attano visaye pavattati,
tika-s0101t0:142_14: daḷhaggahaṇabhāvato vā saṃyuttā ayanti pavattanti sattā yathābhinivesaṃ etenāti samayo, diṭṭhi.
tika-s0101t0:142_19: sammā vā yānaṃ apagamoti samayo, pahānaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:142_22: Abhimukhabhāvena sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti abhisamayo,
tika-s0101t0:142_29: Kālo attho samavāyādīnaṃ atthānaṃ idha asambhavato desadesakaparisānaṃ viya suttassa nidānabhāvena kālassa apadisitabbato ca.
tika-s0101t0:143_3: saddassa vacane ayampi guṇo laddho hotīti dassento “ye vā ime”tiādimāha.
tika-s0101t0:143_8: Yathāvuttappabhedesuyeva samayesu ekadesaṃ pakārantarehi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ “yo cāya”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0101t0:143_9: Tathā hi ñāṇakiccasamayo attahitapaṭipattisamayo ca abhisambodhisamayo.
tika-s0101t0:144_6: Tattha yathā kālo sabhāvadhammaparicchinno sayaṃ paramatthato avijjamānopi ādhārabhāvena paññāto taṅkhaṇappavattānaṃ
tika-s0101t0:144_7: tato pubbe parato ca abhāvato “pubbaṇhe jāto,
tika-s0101t0:144_9: samūho ca avayavavinimutto avijjamānopi kappanāmattasiddho avayavānaṃ ādhārabhāvena paññāpīyati “rukkhe sākhā,
tika-s0101t0:144_14: dhammapuñje vā kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
tika-s0101t0:144_16: dhammapuñje ca phassādayopi hontīti ayañhi tattha attho.
tika-s0101t0:144_20: tasmiṃ samaye”ti ca vutte satīti ayamattho viññāyamāno eva hoti padatthassa sattāvirahābhavatoti samayassa sattākiriyāya cittassa uppādakiriyā,
tika-s0101t0:144_24: paccayasamavāye vā sati kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
tika-s0101t0:144_26: paccayasamavāye ca sati phassādayopi hontīti ubhayattha samaya-
tika-s0101t0:144_27: sadde bhummaniddeso kato lakkhaṇabhūtabhāvayuttoti dassento āha “khaṇa…pe…
tika-s0101t0:145_4: Vītikkamañhi sutvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā otiṇṇavatthukaṃ puggalaṃ paṭipucchitvā,
tika-s0101t0:145_5: vigarahitvā ca taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ otiṇṇakālaṃ anatikkamitvā teneva kālena sikkhāpadāni paññapento bhagavā
tika-s0101t0:146_0: Accantameva ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva desanāniṭṭhānaṃ parahitapaṭipattisaṅkhātena karuṇāvihārena.
tika-s0101t0:148_0: Seṭṭhanti seṭṭhavācakaṃ vacanaṃ seṭṭhanti vuttaṃ seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato.
tika-s0101t0:149_0: Vuttoyeva na pana idha vattabbo visuddhimaggassa imissā aṭṭhakathāya ekadesabhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0101t0:150_3: te vā vineyyasantānesu “kathaṃ nu kho uppajjeyyu”nti vani yāci patthayīti bhagavā,
tika-s0101t0:150_6: yasañca vami khelapiṇḍaṃ viya chaḍḍayīti bhagavā.
tika-s0101t0:150_13: Te bhagavā vami tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena pajahatīti evampi bhage vamīti bhagavā.
tika-s0101t0:151_0: “Dhammasarīraṃ paccakkhaṃ karotī”ti “yo vo ānanda mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto,
tika-s0101t0:151_1: so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti vacanato dhammassa satthubhāvapariyāyo vijjatīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:152_1: Na hi bhagavato rūpakāye kenaci antarāyo sakkā kātunti.
tika-s0101t0:152_3: Sāvakasampattiṃ niddisati paṭisambhidāppattena pañcasu ṭhānesu bhagavatā etadagge ṭhapitena mayā mahāsāvakena sutaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:152_7: Kālasampattiṃ niddisati “bhagavā”ti padassa sannidhāne payuttassa samaya-
tika-s0101t0:156_7: antarantarā kathaṃ opātetī”ti ca ādīsu viya kāraṇavemajjhesu vattamānā antarā-
tika-s0101t0:156_9: na pana cittakhaṇavivaresu vattamānā antarantarikā- saddā. Antarā-
tika-s0101t0:156_17: saddo eva vā “yassantarato”ti ettha gāthāsukhatthaṃ rassaṃ katvā vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Antarā-
tika-s0101t0:156_19: saddena padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā “antarikā”ti vuttoti evamettha udāharaṇodāharitabbānaṃ virodhābhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0101t0:156_20: Ayojiyamāne upayogavacanaṃ na pāpuṇāti sāmivacanassa pasaṅge antarā-
tika-s0101t0:157_2: yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyya,
tika-s0101t0:157_3: “netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī” tiādivacanato diṭṭhisīlānaṃ niyatasabhāvattā sotāpannāpi aññamaññaṃ diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatā,
tika-s0101t0:157_6: tathārūpesu sīlesu sīlasāmaññagato viharatī”ti vacanato puthujjanānampi diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatabhāvo labbhatiyeva.
tika-s0101t0:158_3: nāssa maggapaṭipattiyā koci antarāyo ahosīti ayamattho dīpito hoti.
tika-s0101t0:158_6: Yañhi samayaṃ bhagavā antarā rājagahañca nāḷandañca addhānamaggapaṭipanno,
tika-s0101t0:158_7: tasmiṃyeva samaye suppiyopi taṃ maggaṃ paṭipanno avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
tika-s0101t0:158_11: Pariyāyati attano phalaṃ pariggahetvā pavattatīti pariyāyo,
tika-s0101t0:158_18: nanu saṅgītikālato so avaṇṇavaṇṇānaṃ bhāsitakālo atītoti?
tika-s0101t0:158_23: Atha vā yasmiṃ kāle tehi avaṇṇo vaṇṇo ca bhāsīyati,
tika-s0101t0:158_25: Evañca katvā “tatrāti kālassa paṭiniddeso”ti idañca vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0101t0:159_2: Na hi arasarūpatādayo dosā bhagavati saṃvijjanti,
tika-s0101t0:159_6: Imasmiñca atthe kāraṇanti vatvāti kāraṇaṃ vāti vatvāti attho.
tika-s0101t0:165_1: attano ācariye kāruññappavattiñca dassetvā kiñcāpi antevāsinā ācariyassa anukūlena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:165_2: ayaṃ pana paṇḍitajātikattā na edisesu taṃ anuvattatīti,
tika-s0101t0:165_3: idāni tassa kammassakataññāṇappavattiṃ dassento “ācariye kho panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0101t0:165_4: Vaṇṇaṃ bhāsituṃ āraddho “apināmāyaṃ ettakenāpi ratanattayāvaṇṇato orameyyā”ti.
tika-s0101t0:165_9: Atitthena pakkhando dhammakathikoti na vattabbo aparimāṇaguṇattā buddhādīnaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:165_10: niravasesānañca tesaṃ idha pakāsanaṃ pāḷisaṃvaṇṇanāyeva sampajjatīti.
tika-s0101t0:171_0: Iti ha teti ettha itīti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. Ha-kāro nipātamattanti āha “evaṃ te”ti.
tika-s0101t0:172_2: Tasmiṃ kāleti yasmiṃ saṃvacchare utumhi māse pakkhe vā bhagavā taṃ addhānamaggaṃ paṭipanno,
tika-s0101t0:172_4: Teneva hi kiriyāvicchedadassanavasena “rājagahe piṇḍāya caratī”ti vattamānakālaniddeso kato.
tika-s0101t0:172_8: Taṃ addhānaṃ paṭipanno nāḷandāyaṃ veneyyānaṃ vividha hitasukhanipphattiṃ ākaṅkhamāno imissā ca aṭṭhuppattiyā
tika-s0101t0:172_11: Ettāvatā “kasmā pana bhagavā taṃ addhānaṃ paṭipanno”ti codanā visodhitā hoti.
tika-s0101t0:172_12: “Kasmā ca suppiyo anubandho”ti ayaṃ pana codanā “bhagavato taṃ maggaṃ paṭipannabhāvaṃ ajānanto”ti etena visodhitā hoti.
tika-s0101t0:172_13: Na hi so bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhumeva icchatīti.
tika-s0101t0:173_1: “Samantā asītihatthappamāṇe”ti tāsaṃ rasmīnaṃ pakatiyā pavattiṭṭhānavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:173_2: “Tasmiṃ kira samaye”ti ca tasmiṃ addhānagamanasamaye buddhasiriyā anigūhitabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:173_3: Na hi tadā tassā nigūhane pakkusātiabhigamanādīsu viya kiñcipi kāraṇaṃ atthīti.
tika-s0101t0:174_0: Byāmappabhāparikkhepavilāsinī ca assa bhagavato lakkhaṇamālāti mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni aññamaññapaṭibaddhattā evamāha.
tika-s0101t0:174_1: Dvattiṃsāya candamaṇḍalānaṃ mālā kenaci ganthetvā ṭhapitā yadi siyāti parikappanavasenāha “ganthetvā ṭhapitadvattiṃsacandamālāyā”ti.
tika-s0101t0:174_5: Evaṃ gacchantaṃ bhagavantaṃ bhikkhū ca disvā atha attano parisaṃ avalokesīti sambandho.
tika-s0101t0:174_6: “Yasmā panesā”tiādinā “kasmā ca so ratanattayassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”ti codanaṃ visodheti.
tika-s0101t0:174_10: Bhagavato virodhānunayābhāvavīmaṃsanatthaṃ ete avaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇañca bhāsantīti apare.
tika-s0101t0:175_1: Ambalaṭṭhikāya avidūre bhavattā uyyānaṃ ambalaṭṭhikā yathā “varuṇānagaraṃ,
tika-s0101t0:175_9: na pana tadā suppiyassa parisāya abhāvato.
tika-s0101t0:175_14: evaṃ aññampi edisaṃ payojanābhāvato saṅgītikārehi na saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:175_16: taṃ na yujjati pāḷiāruḷhavasena pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti āpajjanato.
tika-s0101t0:176_13: taṃ ettakanti na sakkā amhehi paṭivijjhituṃ,
tika-s0101t0:177_1: saddoti tassa “bhagavatā”tiādīhi padehi samānādhikaraṇabhāvena vuttassa yena abhisambuddhabhāvena bhagavā pakato supākaṭo ca hoti,
tika-s0101t0:177_2: taṃ abhisambuddhabhāvaṃ saddhiṃ āgamanapaṭipadāya atthabhāvena dassento “yo so…pe…
tika-s0101t0:177_5: saddānaṃ idha paññāvevacanabhāve tena tena visesena nesaṃ savisayavisesappavattidassanatthaṃ asādhāraṇañāṇavisesavasena
tika-s0101t0:179_4: Atha vā tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇatāya jānatā,
tika-s0101t0:179_7: chandādīnaṃ ahānihetubhūtāya aparikkhayapaṭibhānasādhikāya sabbaññutāya sammāsambuddhenāti evaṃ dasabalaṭṭhārasāveṇikabuddhadhammehipi
tika-s0101t0:180_0: Yadipi hīnakalyāṇabhedena duvidhāva adhimutti pāḷiyaṃ vuttā,
tika-s0101t0:180_3: tadapi tathā tathā dassanaṃ khamanaṃ rocanañcāti āha “nānājjhāsayatā…pe…
tika-s0101t0:180_9: kāro nipātamattaṃ saralopo ca katoti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “evaṃ ime”ti.
tika-s0101t0:181_5: “Kadāci ekako”tiādi tesaṃ tesaṃ vineyyānaṃ vinayanānukūlaṃ bhagavato upasaṅkamadassanaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:182_0: Dullabhā sampattīti satipi manussattapaṭilābhe patirūpadesavāsaindriyāvekallasaddhāpaṭilābhādayo guṇā dullabhāti attho.
tika-s0101t0:182_3: Kālayuttanti imissā velāya imassa evaṃ vattabbanti taṃtaṃkālānurūpaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:182_10: Na hi bhagavato kāye rajojallaṃ upalimpatīti.
tika-s0101t0:183_2: “Buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ voloketī”ti idaṃ pacchimayāme bhagavato bahulaāciṇṇavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:183_3: Appekadā avasiṭṭhabalañāṇehi sabbaññutañāṇena ca bhagavā tamatthaṃ sādhetīti.
tika-s0101t0:183_6: “Sineruṃ ukkhipanto viya nabhaṃ paharanto viya cā”ti idaṃ brahmajāladesanāya anaññasādhāraṇattā sudukkaratādassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:184_0: Purimoti “katamāya nu bhavathā”ti evaṃ vutto attho.
tika-s0101t0:184_1: Kā ca pana voti ettha ca-
tika-s0101t0:184_3: Tena yathāpucchitāya kathāya vakkhamānaṃ vippakatabhāvaṃ joteti. Pana-
tika-s0101t0:184_5: Yāya hi kathāya te bhikkhū sannisinnā,
tika-s0101t0:184_6: sā eva antarākathābhūtā vippakatā visesena puna pucchīyatīti.
tika-s0101t0:184_11: Nanu ca tehi bhikkhūhi sā kathā yathādhippāyaṃ “iti ha me”tiādinā niṭṭhapitā yevāti?
tika-s0101t0:184_13: Yadi hi bhagavā tasmiṃ khaṇe na upasaṅkameyya bhiyyopi tappaṭibaddhāyeva kathā pavatteyyuṃ,
tika-s0101t0:184_23: teneva cāyasmatā mahākassapena “brahmajālaṃ āvuso ānanda kattha bhāsita”ntiādinā desādipucchāsu katāsu
tika-s0101t0:184_24: tāsaṃ vissajjanaṃ karontena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena nidānaṃ bhāsitanti tayidamāha “kāla…pe…
tika-s0101t0:185_2: Sammāsambuddhabhāvena hissa pubbaracanādīnaṃ abhāvo sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacāratāya,
tika-s0101t0:185_9: tato eva ca antarāyikaniyyānikadhammesu sammohābhāvasiddhito pacchimavesārajjadvayasiddhīti bhagavato catuvesārajjasamannāgamo,
tika-s0101t0:185_10: attahitaparahitappaṭipatti ca pakāsitā hoti nidānavacanena sampattaparisāya ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ ṭhānuppattikappaṭibhānena dhammadesanādīpanato,
tika-s0101t0:186_1: Ñāṇakaruṇāpariggahitasabbakiriyassa hi bhagavato natthi niratthikā pavatti,
tika-s0101t0:186_3: tasmā paresaṃyeva atthāya pavattasabbakiriyassa sammāsambuddhassa sakalampi kāyavacīmanokammaṃ satthubhūtaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:186_6: Apica satthuno pamāṇabhūtatāvibhāvanena sāsanassa pamāṇabhāvasiddhiyā nidānavacanaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:186_10: Ko hi samattho buddhānubuddhena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitassa nidānassa payojanāni niravasesato vibhāvetunti.
tika-s0101t0:188_2: Desanāpi hi desetabbassa sīlādiatthassa vineyyasantānesu nikkhipanato “nikkhepo”ti vuccati.
tika-s0101t0:188_3: Tattha yathā anekasataanekasahassabhedānipi suttantāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādisāsanappaṭṭhānanayena soḷasavidhataṃ nātivattanti,
tika-s0101t0:188_6: aṭṭhuppattiyā ca parajjhāsayapucchāhi saddhiṃ saṃsaggabhedo sambhavati ajjhāsayapucchānusandhisabbhāvato,
tika-s0101t0:188_7: attajjhāsayaaṭṭhuppattīnaṃ pana aññamaññaṃ saṃsaggo natthīti nayidha niravaseso vitthāranayo sambhavati,
tika-s0101t0:188_9: Atha vā yadipi aṭṭhuppattiyā ajjhāsayena siyā saṃsaggabhedo,
tika-s0101t0:188_10: tadantogadhattā pana sesanikkhepānaṃ mūlanikkhepavasena cattārova dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:188_11: So panāyaṃ suttanikkhepo sāmaññabhāvato paṭhamaṃ vicāretabbo,
tika-s0101t0:188_12: tasmiṃ vicārite yassā aṭṭhuppattiyā idaṃ suttaṃ nikkhittaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:188_15: “atthi bhikkhave”tiādinā ca pavattānaṃ suttānaṃ suttapadesānaṃ vaṇṇanā vuccamānā taṃtaṃanusandhidassanasukhatāya
tika-s0101t0:188_16: suviññeyyā hotīti āha “suttanikkhepaṃ vicāretvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hotī”ti.
tika-s0101t0:189_16: Atha vā nikkhipīyati suttaṃ etenāti suttanikkhepo,
tika-s0101t0:189_18: Etasmiṃ pana atthavikappe attano ajjhāsayo attajjhāsayo,
tika-s0101t0:190_0: Ettha ca paresaṃ indriyaparipākādikāraṇanirapekkhatā attajjhāsayassa visuṃ nikkhepabhāvo yutto.
tika-s0101t0:190_2: Parajjhāsayapucchāvasikānaṃ pana paresaṃ ajjhāsayapucchānaṃ desanānimittabhūtānaṃ uppattiyaṃ pavattitānaṃ kathaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ anavarodho,
tika-s0101t0:190_3: pucchāvasikaaṭṭhuppattikānaṃ vā parajjhāsayānurodhena pavattitadesanattā kathaṃ parajjhāsaye anavarodhoti na codetabbametaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:190_4: Paresañhi abhinīhāraparipucchādivinimuttasseva suttadesanākāraṇuppādassa aṭṭhuppattibhāvena gahitattā parajjhāsayapucchāvasikānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:190_6: Paresaṃ pucchaṃ vinā ajjhāsayameva nimittaṃ katvā desito parajjhāsayo,
tika-s0101t0:190_9: Sammappadhānasuttantahārakoti anupubbena niddiṭṭhānaṃ saṃyuttake sammappadhānapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ suttānaṃ āvaḷi,
tika-s0101t0:191_0: Vaṇṇāvaṇṇeti ettha “acchariyaṃ āvuso”tiādinā bhikkhusaṅghena vutto vaṇṇopi saṅgahito,
tika-s0101t0:191_1: taṃ pana aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā “atthi bhikkhave aññe ca dhammā”tiādinā upari desanaṃ ārabhissatīti.
tika-s0101t0:191_2: “Mamaṃ vā bhikkhave pare vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”nti imissā desanāya brahmadattena vuttavaṇṇo aṭṭhuppattīti katvā vuttaṃ “antevāsī vaṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:191_3: Iti imaṃ vaṇṇāvaṇṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā”ti. Vā-
tika-s0101t0:191_5: Tathā hesa “paṇḍito vāpi tena so”tiādīsu upamāne dissati,
tika-s0101t0:191_10: “ayaṃ vā imesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sabbabālo sabbamūḷho”tiādīsu vavassagge,
tika-s0101t0:191_12: “ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā”tiādīsu vikappe,
tika-s0101t0:191_15: saddo attheva aññatthe “ahañceva kho pana dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:191_16: pare ca me na ājāneyyu”ntiādīsu atthi adhike “indriyaparopariyattañāṇa”ntiādīsu atthi pacchābhāge “parato āgamissatī”tiādīsu.
tika-s0101t0:191_17: Atthi paccanīkabhāve “uppannaṃ parappavādaṃ saha dhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā”tiādīsu.
tika-s0101t0:192_4: Sabhāvadhammato aññassa kattuabhāvajotanatthaṃ āhanatīti kattuatthe āghātasaddaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0101t0:192_10: saddassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni tattha pariyāyenapi atthaṃ dassento “kopassetaṃ adhivacana”nti āha.
tika-s0101t0:192_14: taṃmukhena pana na pacceti tenāti appaccayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:193_1: Tumhanti “tumhāka”nti iminā samānattho eko saddo “yathā amhāka”nti iminā samānattho “amha”nti ayaṃ saddo. Yathāha,
tika-s0101t0:193_4: Yasmā tumhākaṃyeva ca bhaveyya tena kopādinā paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ antarāyo,
tika-s0101t0:193_5: tasmā te kopādipariyāyena vuttā āghātādayo na karaṇīyāti attho.
tika-s0101t0:193_6: Tena nāhaṃ “sabbaññū”ti issarabhāvena tumhe tato nivāremi,
tika-s0101t0:193_7: atha kho iminā nāma kāraṇenāti dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:193_8: Taṃ pana kāraṇavacanaṃ yasmā ādīnavavibhāvanaṃ hoti,
tika-s0101t0:193_10: “Api nu tumhe”tiādinā manopadoso na kālantarabhāvinoyeva hitasukhassa antarāyakaro,
tika-s0101t0:193_11: atha kho taṅkhaṇappavattirahassapi hitasukhassa antarāyakaroti manopadose ādīnavaṃ daḷhataraṃ katvā dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:193_12: Yesaṃ kesañci “pare”tiādīsu viya na paṭiviruddhānaṃyevāti attho.
tika-s0101t0:194_10: Kodho sahateti yadetaṃ kodhassa sahanaṃ abhibhavanaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:194_12: Atha vā yaṃ naraṃ kodho sahate abhibhavati,
tika-s0101t0:194_14: tato ca kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti,
tika-s0101t0:195_0: “Idañcidañca kāraṇa”nti iminā sabbaññū eva amhākaṃ satthā aviparītadhammadesanattā,
tika-s0101t0:195_3: “Idañcidañca kāraṇa”nti etena ca “na sabbaññū”tiādivacanaṃ abhūtaṃ atacchanti nibbeṭhitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0101t0:195_6: Catutthañcāti “na ca panetaṃ amhesu saṃvijjatī”ti padaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:195_8: Avaṇṇeyevāti kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ vatvā dosapatiṭṭhāpanavasena nindane eva.
tika-s0101t0:195_9: Na sabbatthāti kevalaṃ akkosanakhuṃsanavambhanādīsu na ekantena nibbeṭhanaṃ kātabbanti attho.
tika-s0101t0:196_1: Ānandanti pamodanti etena dhammena taṃsamaṅgino sattāti ānanda-
tika-s0101t0:196_5: tassa bhāvo somanassanti tadaññadhammānampi sampayuttānaṃ somanassabhāvo āpajjatīti?
tika-s0101t0:196_6: Nāpajjati ruḷhīsaddattā yathā “paṅkaja”nti dassento “cetasikasukhassetaṃ adhivacana”nti āha.
tika-s0101t0:196_11: Yāya uppannāya kāyacittaṃ vātapūritabhastā viya uddhumāyanākārappattaṃ hoti,
tika-s0101t0:196_15: atha kho āyatiṃ kulaputtānaṃ edisesupi ṭhānesu akusaluppattiṃ paṭisedhento dhammanettiṃ ṭhapetī”ti,
tika-s0101t0:196_17: ekena vedanākkhandho vutto”ti ettha “tesaṃ vasena sesānampi sampayuttadhammānaṃ karaṇaṃ paṭikkhittamevā”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ, “pi-
tika-s0101t0:196_18: saddo sambhāvane”tiādinā idha ca vuttanayena attho yathāsambhavaṃ veditabbo.
tika-s0101t0:196_19: “Tumhaṃyevassa tena antarāyo”ti etthāpi “antarāyoti ida”ntiādinā heṭṭhā avaṇṇapakkhe vuttanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0101t0:197_0: Kasmā panetanti ca vakkhamānaṃyeva atthaṃ manasi katvā codeti.
tika-s0101t0:197_1: Ācariyo “saccaṃ vaṇṇita”nti tamatthaṃ paṭijānitvā “taṃ pana nekkhammanissita”ntiādinā pariharati.
tika-s0101t0:197_8: Tasmāti yasmā gehassitapītisomanassaṃ jhānādīnaṃ antarāyakaraṃ, tasmā.
tika-s0101t0:197_9: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “somanassaṃ pāhaṃ devānaṃ inda duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbampi asevitabbampī”ti.
tika-s0101t0:197_13: pītiggahaṇena pana somanassampi gahitameva hoti somanassarahitāya pītiyā abhāvatoti pītiyeva gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:197_14: Atha vā sevitabbāsevitabbavibhāgavacanato somanassassa pākaṭo antarāyakarabhāvo,
tika-s0101t0:197_15: na tathā pītiyāti pītiyeva lobhasahagatattena visesetvā vuttā.
tika-s0101t0:197_16: “Luddho attha”ntiādigāthānaṃ “kuddho attha”ntiādi gāthāsu viya attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0101t0:198_3: tatra ce tumhe assatha ānandino sumanā ubbilāvitā,
tika-s0101t0:198_4: api nu tumhe paresaṃ subhāsitadubbhāsitaṃ ājāneyyāthāti.
tika-s0101t0:198_6: so desanākāle nīharitvā desetabbapuggalābhāvato desanāya anāgatopi tadatthasambhavato atthato āgatoyevāti
tika-s0101t0:198_7: daṭṭhabbo yathā taṃ kathāvatthupakaraṇaṃ vitthāravasenāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0101t0:198_8: “Atthato āgato yevā”ti etena saṃvaṇṇanākāle tathā bujjhanakasattānaṃ vasena so vāro ānetvā vattabboti dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:200_14: manomattā dhātu manodhātū”ti ca ādīsu viya.
tika-s0101t0:200_16: oramattaka”nti padadvayena sāmaññato vuttoyeva hi attho sīlamattakanti visesavasena vutto.
tika-s0101t0:200_17: Atha vā sīlenapi tadekadesasseva saṅgahaṇatthaṃ appakatthavācako,
tika-s0101t0:200_20: Tathā hi indriyasaṃvarapaccayasannissitasīlāni idha desanaṃ anāruḷhāni.
tika-s0101t0:200_21: Na hi tāni pātimokkhaājīvapārisuddhisīlāni viya sabbaputhujjanesu pākaṭānīti.
tika-s0101t0:201_14: Satañca gandhoti ettha gandho viyāti gandhoti vutto sīlanibandhano thutighoso.
tika-s0101t0:202_0: “Appakaṃ bahuka”nti idaṃ pārāpāraṃ viya aññamaññaṃ upanidhāya vuccatīti āha “upariguṇe upanidhāyā”ti.
tika-s0101t0:202_3: tena idaṃ dasseti “yasmā sīlaṃ kiñcāpi patiṭṭhābhāvena samādhissa bahukāraṃ,
tika-s0101t0:202_4: pabhāvādiguṇavisese panassa upanidhāya kalampi na upeti,
tika-s0101t0:202_7: Idāni “katha”nti pucchitvā samādhissa ānubhāvaṃ vitthārato vibhāveti. “Abhi…pe…
tika-s0101t0:202_10: Yamakapāṭihāriyakaraṇatthāya hi bhagavato citte uppanne tadanucchavikaṃ ṭhānaṃ icchitabbanti ratanamaṇḍapādi
tika-s0101t0:202_11: sakkassa devarañño āṇāya vissakammunā nimmitanti vadanti,
tika-s0101t0:202_13: “Yo koci evarūpaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ samattho atthi ce,
tika-s0101t0:207_0: “Channaṃ vaṇṇānanti ādinayappavatta”nti etthāpi nīlānaṃ pītakānaṃ lohitakānaṃ odātānaṃ mañjiṭṭhānaṃ pabhassarānanti ayaṃ pāḷiseso.
tika-s0101t0:207_3: nimmito caṅkamati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappetī”tiādinā catūsu iriyāpathesu ekekamūlakā satthuvasena cattāro,
tika-s0101t0:207_4: nimmitavasena cattāroti sabbeva aṭṭha vāre vitthāretabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:208_1: Attā mitto majjhatto verīti catūsu sīmasambhedavasena caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ mettākammaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:208_3: Tattha “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru cā”tiādipāḷi vasena caturaṅgasamannāgatatā veditabbā.
tika-s0101t0:208_4: “Kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno”tiādinā jarāmaraṇamukhena paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ otāretvā.
tika-s0101t0:208_5: Ānāpānacatutthajjhānanti etthāpi “sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇa”nti padaṃ vibhattivipariṇāmaṃ katvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:209_2: Sabbopi hi puthujjano bhagavato upari guṇe vibhāvetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0101t0:209_11: Bahūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā ca avihatattā tā janenti,
tika-s0101t0:209_15: Puthu satthārānaṃ mukhullokikāti ettha puthū janā satthupaṭiññā etesanti puthujjanāti vacanattho. Puthu…pe…
tika-s0101t0:209_27: Puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rattāti ettha jāyatīti jano,
tika-s0101t0:209_30: puthūsu vā janā jātā rattāti evaṃ rāgādiattho eva vā jana-
tika-s0101t0:210_3: Guṇanemittakāneva hi bhagavato sabbāni nāmāni. Yathāha –
tika-s0101t0:213_0: Tathā āgatoti ettha ākāraniyamanavasena opammasampaṭipādanattho tathā- saddo.
tika-s0101t0:213_6: taṃ karuṇāpadhānattā mahākaruṇāmukhena purimabuddhānaṃ āgamanapaṭipadaṃ udāharaṇavasena sāmaññato dassento
tika-s0101t0:213_9: Taṃ pana paṭipadaṃ mahāpadānasuttādīsu sambahulaniddesena supākaṭānaṃ āsannānañca vipassīādīnaṃ channaṃ
tika-s0101t0:213_13: Sabbesañhi buddhānaṃ kāyappaṇidhānaṃ imināva abhinīhārena samijjhatīti.
tika-s0101t0:213_14: Evaṃ mahābhinīhāravasena “tathāgato”ti padassa atthaṃ dassetvā idāni pāramīpūraṇavasena dassetuṃ “yathā vipassī bhagavā…pe…
tika-s0101t0:214_0: Ettha ca suttantikānaṃ mahābodhiyānapaṭipadāya kosallajananatthaṃ pāramīsu ayaṃ vitthārakathā –
tika-s0101t0:215_2: Taṇhāmānādīhi anupahatā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā dānādayo guṇā pāramiyo.
tika-s0101t0:216_0: Kenaṭṭhena pāramiyoti dānasīlādiguṇavisesayogena sattuttamatāya paramā mahāsattā bodhisattā,
tika-s0101t0:216_10: Atha vā paraṃ sattaṃ attani mavati bandhati guṇavisesayogena,
tika-s0101t0:216_11: paraṃ vā adhikataraṃ majjati sujjhati saṃkilesamalato,
tika-s0101t0:216_12: paraṃ vā seṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ visesena mayati gacchati,
tika-s0101t0:216_13: paraṃ vā lokaṃ pamāṇabhūtena ñāṇavisesena idhalokaṃ viya munāti paricchindati,
tika-s0101t0:216_14: paraṃ vā ativiya sīlādiguṇagaṇaṃ attano santāne minoti pakkhipati,
tika-s0101t0:216_16: paṭipakkhaṃ vā tadanatthakaraṃ kilesacoragaṇaṃ mināti hiṃsatīti paramo,
tika-s0101t0:216_19: Pāre vā nibbāne majjati sujjhati satte ca sodheti,
tika-s0101t0:216_20: tattha vā satte mavati bandhati yojeti,
tika-s0101t0:216_21: taṃ vā mayati gacchati gameti ca,
tika-s0101t0:216_24: kilesāriṃ vā sattānaṃ tattha mināti hiṃsatīti pāramī,
tika-s0101t0:217_0: Katividhāti saṅkhepato dasavidhā, tā pana pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato āgatāyeva. Yathāha –
tika-s0101t0:220_4: sīlaṃ nekkhammaṃ paññā vīriyaṃ khanti saccamadhiṭṭhānaṃ mettā upekkhā buddhakārako dhammo,
tika-s0101t0:220_5: ime kho sāriputta dasa buddhakārakā dhammāti.
tika-s0101t0:220_7: idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā –
tika-s0101t0:222_0: Khanti saccaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ, mettupekkhāti te dasā’ti”.
tika-s0101t0:224_0: Ko tāsaṃ kamoti ettha kamo nāma desanākkamo,
tika-s0101t0:224_3: iti yathā ādimhi pavicitā samādinnā ca,
tika-s0101t0:224_5: Tattha ca dānaṃ sīlassa bahūpakāraṃ sukarañcāti taṃ ādimhi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:224_6: Dānaṃ sīlapariggahitaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsanti dānānantaraṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:224_14: mettā upekkhāpariggahitā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsāti mettānantaraṃ upekkhā vuttā.
tika-s0101t0:224_17: Kathaṃ pana mahākāruṇikā bodhisattā sattesu upekkhakā hontīti?
tika-s0101t0:225_7: bhogasampattihetuṃ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato ca dānassa anantaraṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:225_12: vītikkamappahānena cittassa pariyuṭṭhānappahānavacanato ca sīlassa anantaraṃ nekkhammaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:225_18: parahitajjhānena parahitakaraṇūpāyakosallavacanato ca nekkhammassa anantaraṃ paññā vuttā.
tika-s0101t0:225_23: Nisammakārino hi uṭṭhānaṃ phalavisesamāvahatīti paññāya anantaraṃ vīriyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:226_1: Vīriyavā hi āraddhavīriyattā sattasaṅkhārehi upanītaṃ dukkhaṃ abhibhuyya viharati vīriyassa titikkhālaṅkārabhāvato.
tika-s0101t0:226_9: Yāthāvato dhammanijjhāne hi sati taṇhā na hoti.
tika-s0101t0:226_10: Parahitārambhe paramepi parakatadukkhasahanabhāvavacanato ca vīriyassa anantaraṃ khanti vuttā.
tika-s0101t0:226_14: sattasuññatādhammanijjhānakkhantiṃ vatvā tadupabrūhitañāṇasaccavacanato ca khantiyā anantaraṃ saccaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:226_18: Saccasandho hi dānādīsu paṭiññānurūpaṃ niccalova pavattati.
tika-s0101t0:226_21: te ca niṭṭhāpeti paṭipakkhehi akampiyabhāvatoti saccassa anantaraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:226_26: samādānasambhavato ca adhiṭṭhānassa anantaraṃ mettā vuttā.
tika-s0101t0:226_30: “hitakāmasattepi upekkhako”ti acchariyaguṇabhāvavacanato ca mettāya anantaraṃ upekkhā vuttāti evametāsaṃ kamo veditabbo.
tika-s0101t0:227_1: Ettha avisesena tāva sabbāpi pāramiyo parānuggahalakkhaṇā,
tika-s0101t0:228_0: Visesena pana yasmā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā attupakaraṇapariccāgacetanā dānapāramitā.
tika-s0101t0:228_6: Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitaṃ sattasaṅkhārāparādhasahanaṃ adosappadhāno tadākārappavatto cittuppādo khantipāramitā.
tika-s0101t0:228_9: Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahito lokassa hitūpasaṃhāro atthato abyāpādo mettāpāramitā.
tika-s0101t0:228_10: Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā anunayapaṭighaviddhaṃsinī iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu sattasaṅkhāresu samappavatti upekkhāpāramitā.
tika-s0101t0:229_49: Ettha ca karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitatā dānādīnaṃ pariccāgādilakkhaṇassa visesanabhāvena vattabbā,
tika-s0101t0:230_1: Yo hi ayaṃ “manussattaṃ liṅgasampattī”tiādi aṭṭhadhammasamodhānasampādito “tiṇṇo tāreyyaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:230_10: Tappavattiyā hi uddhaṃ pāramīnaṃ pavicayupaṭṭhānasamādānādhiṭṭhānanipphattiyo mahāpurisānaṃ sambhavanti.
tika-s0101t0:231_3: Tattha upāyakosallaṃ nāma dānādīnaṃ bodhisambhārabhāvassa nimittabhūtā paññā,
tika-s0101t0:231_21: karuṇānugatattā na ca na sabbesaṃ anuggahāya pavatto,
tika-s0101t0:231_23: paññānugatattā na ca na sabbattha virattacitto.
tika-s0101t0:231_35: balavesārajjanipphattīti sabbassāpi pāramitāphalassa visesena upāyabhāvato paññākaruṇā pāramīnaṃ paccayo.
tika-s0101t0:231_36: Idañca dvayaṃ pāramīnaṃ viya paṇidhānassāpi paccayo.
tika-s0101t0:232_0: Tathā ussāhaummaṅgaavatthānahitacariyā ca pāramīnaṃ paccayoti veditabbā,
tika-s0101t0:235_3: alobha…pe… lobhe, adosa…pe… dose, amoha…pe… mohe,
tika-s0101t0:236_0: Tasmā ete bodhisattānaṃ cha ajjhāsayā dānādīnaṃ paccayāti veditabbā.
tika-s0101t0:237_0: “Kati pana bhante bodhāya carantānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ ajjhāsayā?
tika-s0101t0:237_1: Dasa kho sāriputta bodhāya carantānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ ajjhāsayā.
tika-s0101t0:237_3: Dānajjhāsayā sāriputta bodhisattā macchere dosadassāvino, sīla…pe…
tika-s0101t0:238_1: sukhadukkhasaṅkhātesu ādīnavadassanapubbaṅgamā dānādininnacittatāsaṅkhātā dānajjhāsayatādayo dānādipāramīnaṃ nibbattiyā kāraṇanti.
tika-s0101t0:238_2: Tathā apariccāgapariccāgādīsu yathākkamaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇā dānādipāramīnaṃ paccayo.
tika-s0101t0:239_8: tadāsattinidānañca maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitacittānaṃ apāyūpapattisambhavatoti evaṃ vividhavipulānatthāvahā ete atthā nāma,
tika-s0101t0:239_9: tesaṃ pariccāgoyeveko sotthibhāvoti pariccāge appamādo karaṇīyo.
tika-s0101t0:240_0: Apica “yācako yācamāno attano guyhassa ācikkhanato mayhaṃ vissāsiko”ti ca “pahāya gamanīyaṃ attano santakaṃ
tika-s0101t0:240_1: gahetvā paralokaṃ yāhīti mayhaṃ upadesako”ti ca “āditte viya agāre maraṇagginā āditte loke tato mayhaṃ
tika-s0101t0:240_2: santakassa apavāhakasahāyo”ti ca “apavāhitassa cassa nijjhāyanikkhepaṭṭhānabhūto”ti ca “dānasaṅkhāte
tika-s0101t0:240_4: sabbasampattīnaṃ aggabhūtāya paramadullabhāya buddhabhūmiyā sampattihetubhāvato ca paramo kalyāṇamitto”ti ca paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:241_1: tasmā sā sambhāvanā avitathā kātabbā”ti ca “ekantabheditāya jīvitassa ayācitenapi mayā dātabbaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:241_3: sayamevāgato mama puññenā”ti ca “yācakassa dānāpadesena mayhamevāyamanuggaho”ti ca “ahaṃ viya ayaṃ sabbopi
tika-s0101t0:241_4: loko mayā anuggahetabbo”ti ca “asati yācake kathaṃ mayhaṃ dānapāramī pūreyyā”ti ca “yācakānamevatthāya
tika-s0101t0:241_5: mayā sabbo pariggahetabbo”ti ca “ayācitvā mama santakaṃ yācakā sayameva kadā gaṇheyyu”nti ca “kathamahaṃ
tika-s0101t0:241_6: yācakānaṃ piyo cassaṃ manāpo”ti ca “kathaṃ vā te mayhaṃ piyā cassu manāpā”ti ca “kathaṃ vāhaṃ dadamāno,
tika-s0101t0:241_7: datvāpi ca attamano assaṃ pamudito pītisomanassajāto”ti ca “kathaṃ vā me yācakā bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-s0101t0:241_8: uḷāro ca dānajjhāsayo”ti ca “kathaṃ vāhamayācitoyeva yācakānaṃ hadayamaññāya dadeyya”nti ca “sati dhane
tika-s0101t0:241_9: yācake ca apariccāgo mahatī mayhaṃ vañcanā”ti ca “kathaṃ vāhaṃ attano aṅgāni jīvitaṃ vāpi yācakānaṃ pariccajeyya”nti
tika-s0101t0:242_0: Apica “attho nāmāyaṃ nirapekkhaṃ dāyakaṃ anugacchati yathā taṃ nirapekkhaṃ khepakaṃ kiṭako”ti atthe nirapekkhatāya cittaṃ uppādetabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:242_4: “ayaṃ maṃ yācamāno addhā iminā pariccāgena mitto hotī”ti somanassaṃ uppādetabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:242_8: ayaṃ maṃ yācamāno addhā iminā pariccāgena verīpi piyo mitto hotī”ti visesato somanassaṃ uppādetabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:242_9: Evaṃ piyapuggale viya majjhattaverīpuggalesupi mettāpubbaṅgamaṃ karuṇaṃ upaṭṭhapetvāva dātabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:243_0: Sace panassa cirakālaparibhāvitattā lobhassa deyyadhammavisayā lobhadhammā uppajjeyyuṃ,
tika-s0101t0:243_1: tena bodhisattapaṭiññena iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṃ “nanu tayā sappurisa sambodhāya abhinīhāraṃ karontena
tika-s0101t0:243_4: tattha nāma te bāhirepi vatthusmiṃ atisaṅgappavatti hatthisinānasadisī hoti,
tika-s0101t0:243_5: tasmā tayā na katthaci saṅgo uppādetabbo.
tika-s0101t0:243_6: Seyyathāpi nāma mahato bhesajjarukkhassa tiṭṭhato mūlaṃ mūlatthikā haranti,
tika-s0101t0:243_7: papaṭikaṃ, tacaṃ, khandhaṃ, viṭapaṃ, sāraṃ, sākhaṃ, palāsaṃ, pupphaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:243_9: na tassa rukkhassa ‘mayhaṃ santakaṃ ete harantī”ti vitakkasamudācāro hoti,
tika-s0101t0:243_10: evameva sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpajjantena mayā mahādukkhe akataññuke niccāsucimhi kāye paresaṃ upakārāya
tika-s0101t0:243_12: ko vā ettha viseso ajjhattikabāhiresu mahābhūtesu ekantabhedanavikiraṇaviddhaṃsanadhammesu,
tika-s0101t0:243_18: maṃsādīsu ca anapekkhena hutvā ‘taṃtadatthikā harantū’ti nissaṭṭhacittena bhavitabba”nti.
tika-s0101t0:243_19: Evaṃ paṭisañcikkhato cassa bodhāya pahitattassa kāyajīvitesu nirapekkhassa appakasireneva kāyavacīmanokammāni suvisuddhāni honti.
tika-s0101t0:243_22: abhayadānasaddhammadānehi ca sabbasatte anuggaṇhituṃ samattho hotīti.
tika-s0101t0:244_1: idañhi sīlaṃ nāma gaṅgodakādīhi visodhetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa dosamalassa vikkhālanajalaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:244_6: khattiyamahāsālādīhi devatāhi ca vandanīyādibhāvāvahanato paramo vasīkaraṇamanto,
tika-s0101t0:244_12: tassa tassa samijjhanūpāyabhāvato cintāmaṇikapparukkhādike ca atiseti.
tika-s0101t0:244_13: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “ijjhati bhikkhave sīlavato cetopaṇidhi visuddhattā”ti.
tika-s0101t0:244_14: Aparampi vuttaṃ “ākaṅkheyya ce bhikkhave bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo ca assaṃ manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cāti,
tika-s0101t0:244_17: “pañcime gahapatayo ānisaṃsā sīlavato sīlasampadāyā”ti suttānañca vasena sīlassa guṇā paccavekkhitabbā,
tika-s0101t0:245_6: Sīlavato hi attano sīlasampadāhetu mahantaṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppajjati “kataṃ vata mayā kusalaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:245_13: Tathā sīlavato yvāyaṃ “kataṃ vata mayā pāpaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:245_20: nihīnajaccopi sīlavā khattiyamahāsālādīnaṃ pūjanīyo hotīti kulasampattiṃ atiseti sīlasampadā,
tika-s0101t0:245_22: idha te assa puriso dāso kammakaro”tiādi vacanañcettha sādhakaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:245_27: paramassa cittissariyassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato khattiyādīnaṃ issariyaṃ atiseti sīlaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:245_28: Sīlanimittañhi taṃtaṃsattanikāyesu sattānaṃ issariyaṃ vassasatadīghappamāṇato jīvitato ekāhampi sīlavato jīvitassa visiṭṭhatāvacanato,
tika-s0101t0:245_29: sati ca jīvite sikkhānikkhepassa maraṇatāvacanato sīlaṃ jīvitato visiṭṭhataraṃ.
tika-s0101t0:245_31: jarārogavipattīhi anabhibhavanīyato ca rūpasampattiṃ atiseti sīlaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:245_34: Sabhāvasiniddhe santikāvacarepi bandhujane mittajane ca atiseti ekantahitasampādanato,
tika-s0101t0:245_36: “Na taṃ mātā pitā kayirā”tiādi vacanañcettha sādhakaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:245_38: mantāgadasotthānappayogehi ca durārakkhaṃ attānaṃ ārakkhabhāvena sīlameva visiṭṭhataraṃ attādhīnato,
tika-s0101t0:245_42: Evamanekaguṇasamannāgataṃ sīlanti paccavekkhantassa aparipuṇṇā ceva sīlasampadā pāripūriṃ gacchati aparisuddhā ca pārisuddhiṃ.
