tika-s0101t0:1215_8: Evamāhāti “evaṃ saññā hi bho purisassa attā”tiādiākārena saññānirodhamāha.
tika-s0101t0:1215_9: Iminā nayena ito paresu dvīsu ṭhānesu yathārahaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0101t0:1216_1: Āthabbaṇaṃ payojetvāti āthabbaṇavede āgataaggijuhanapubbakaṃ mantajappanaṃ payojetvā sīsacchinnatādidassanena saññānirodhamāha.
tika-s0101t0:1217_2: Madaniddanti surāmadanimittakaṃ supanaṃ devatūpahāranti naccanagāyanādinā devatānaṃ pūjaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1218_0: Elamūgakathā viyāti imesaṃ paṇḍitamānīnaṃ kathā andhabālakathāsadisī.
tika-s0101t0:1218_1: Cattāro nirodheti aññamaññavidhure cattāro nirodhe ete paññapenti.
tika-s0101t0:1218_7: ayaṃ nirodho”ti āmeḍitavacanaṃ satthā attano desanāvilāsena anekākāravokāraṃ nirodhaṃ vibhāvessatīti
tika-s0101t0:1218_8: dassanatthaṃ kataṃ aho nūnāti ettha ahoti acchariye,
tika-s0101t0:1218_10: Tasmā aho nūna bhagavā anaññasādhāraṇadesanattā nirodhampi aho acchariyaṃ katvā katheyya maññeti adhippāyo.
tika-s0101t0:1218_16: Kālapuggalādivibhāgena bahubhedattā imesaṃ nirodhadhammānanti bahuvacanaṃ, kusala-
tika-s0101t0:1218_19: Sabhāvaṃ jānātīti nirodhassa sabhāvaṃ yāthāvato jānāti.
tika-s0101t0:1220_1: Gharamajjheyeva pakkhalitāti gharato bahi gantukāmā purisā maggaṃ anotaritvā gharājirena samatale vivaṭaṅgaṇe eva pakkhalanaṃ pattā,
tika-s0101t0:1220_4: sādhāraṇo paccayoti evamādi vibhāgena idha payojanaṃ natthi saññāya akāraṇabhāvapaṭikkhepattā codanāyāti vuttaṃ “kāraṇasseva nāma”nti.
tika-s0101t0:1221_13: so “sahetuko”ti veditabbo tathārūpāya paṭipattiyā vinā abhāvato.
tika-s0101t0:1221_15: tato eva ca idhāpi vuttaṃ “saññāya sahetukaṃ uppādanirodhaṃ dīpetu”nti.
tika-s0101t0:1222_0: Sikkhā ekāti ettha sikkhāti karaṇe paccattavacanaṃ, eka-
tika-s0101t0:1222_1: saddo aññapariyāyo “ittheke abhivadanti sato vā pana sattassā”tiādīsu viya,
tika-s0101t0:1222_2: na saṅkhyāvācīti āha “sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjantīti sikkhāya ekaccā saññā jāyantī”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1223_2: Sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappavasena pariyāpannattā āgatāti sabhāvato upakārato ca paññākkhandhe pariyāpannattā
tika-s0101t0:1223_4: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “yā cāvuso visākha sammādiṭṭhi,
tika-s0101t0:1223_6: ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti kāmañcettha vuttanayena tissopi sikkhā āgatā eva,
tika-s0101t0:1224_1: Asamuppannakāmacāroti vattamānuppannatāvasena asamuppanno yo koci kāmacāro yā kāci lobhuppatti.
tika-s0101t0:1224_2: Purimo visayavasena niyamitattā kāmaguṇārammaṇova lobho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-s0101t0:1224_3: itaro pana jhānanikantibhavarāgādippabhedo sabbopi lobhacāro kāmanaṭṭhena kāmesu pavattanato.
tika-s0101t0:1224_4: Sabbepi hi tebhūmakā dhammā kāmanīyaṭṭhena kāmāti.
tika-s0101t0:1224_5: Ubhayesampi kāmasaññātināmatā sahacaraṇañāyenāti “kāmasaññā”ti paduddhāraṃ katvā tadubhayaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1225_1: Kāmaṃ pañcakāmaguṇikarāgopi asamuppanno eva maggena samugghāṭīyati,
tika-s0101t0:1225_2: tasmiṃ pana samugghāṭitepi na sabbo rāgo samugghāṭaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0101t0:1225_3: tasmā pañcakāmaguṇikarāgaggahaṇena na itarassa sabbassa rāgassa gahaṇaṃ hotīti ubhayasādhāraṇena pariyāyena
tika-s0101t0:1225_4: ubhayaṃ saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ kāmasaññāggahaṇaṃ katanti tadubhayaṃ sarūpato visesato ca dassetvā
tika-s0101t0:1225_5: sabbasaṅgāhikabhāvato “asamuppannakāmacāro pana imasmiṃ ṭhāne vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1226_2: Anāgatā hi idha “nirujjhatī”ti vuttā anuppādassa adhippetattā,
tika-s0101t0:1227_0: Nīvaraṇavivekato jātattā vivekajehi paṭhamajjhānapītisukhehi saha akkhātabbā,
tika-s0101t0:1227_2: Nānattasaññāpaṭighasaññāhi nipuṇatāya sukhumabhūtatāya sukhumasaññā bhūtā sukhumabhāvena,
tika-s0101t0:1227_4: Jhānaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammānaṃ bhāvanāsiddhā saṇhasukhumatā nīvaraṇavikkhambhanavasena viññāyatīti āha
tika-s0101t0:1228_0: Samāpajjanādhiṭṭhānāni viya vuṭṭhānaṃ jhāne pariyāpannampi hoti yathā taṃ dhammānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇo dhammesu,
tika-s0101t0:1228_1: na āvajjanapaccavekkhaṇānīti “paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjanto adhiṭṭhahanto vuṭṭhahanto ca sikkhatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:1228_6: Hetubhāvo cettha jhānassa yathāvuttasaññāya uppattiyā sahajātādipaccayabhāvo kāmasaññāya nirodhassa upanissayatāva,
tika-s0101t0:1228_8: Tathā ceva saṃvaṇṇitaṃ “tathārūpāya paṭipattiyā vinā abhāvato”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1228_9: Etenupāyenāti yvāyaṃ paṭhamajjhānatappaṭipakkhasaññāvasena “sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjati,
tika-s0101t0:1228_10: sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhatī”ti ettha attho vutto,
tika-s0101t0:1229_1: Yasmā panettha samāpattivasena taṃtaṃsaññānaṃ uppādanirodhe vuccamāne aṅgavasena so vuttoti āha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
tika-s0101t0:1229_3: Anupadadhammavipassanañhi karonto samāpattiṃ patvā aṅgato sammasanaṃ karoti,
tika-s0101t0:1229_4: na ca saññā samāpattiyā kiñci aṅgaṃ hoti.
tika-s0101t0:1229_5: Vuttañca “idañca saññā saññāti evaṃ aṅgato sammasanaṃ uddhaṭa”nti.
tika-s0101t0:1230_0: Yato khoti paccatte nissakkavacananti āha “yo nāmā”ti yathā “ādimhī”ti etasmiṃ atthe “ādito”ti vuccati itaravibhattitopi to-
tika-s0101t0:1230_5: Sakasaññīti cettha upari vuccamānanirodhapādakatāya sātisayāya jhānasaññāya atthibhāvajotako ī-
tika-s0101t0:1230_8: Tasmā tattha tattha sakasaññitāggahaṇena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ jhāne sabbaso suciṇṇavasībhāvo dīpitoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1231_9: Yadaggena hi tattha saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā pakativipassakānaṃ sammasituṃ asakkuṇeyyarūpena ṭhitā,
tika-s0101t0:1231_10: tadaggena heṭṭhimasamāpattidhammā viya paṭukiccakaraṇasamatthāpi na hontīti.
tika-s0101t0:1231_11: Svāyamattho paramatthamañjusāyaṃ visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ āruppakathāyaṃ savisesaṃ vutto,
tika-s0101t0:1231_13: Keci pana “yathā heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā samāpattiyo uparimānaṃ uparimānaṃ adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ sādhenti,
tika-s0101t0:1231_14: na evaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpatti kassacipi adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ sādheti,
tika-s0101t0:1232_1: Jhānaṃ samāpajjanto hi jhānasukhaṃ attani saṃvidahati nāma.
tika-s0101t0:1232_6: tasmā phalūpacārena kāraṇaṃ dassento “nikantiṃ kurumāno abhisaṅkharoti nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1232_7: Imā idāni me labbhamānā ākiñcaññāyatanasaññā nirujjheyyuṃ taṃsamatikkameneva uparijhānatthāya cetanābhisaṅkharaṇasambhavato.
tika-s0101t0:1232_11: Ākiñcaññāyatanato vuṭṭhāya eva hi uparijhānatthāya cetanābhisaṅkharaṇāni bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-s0101t0:1233_0: Cetentovāti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanajjhānaṃ ekaṃ dve cittavāre samāpajjanto eva.
tika-s0101t0:1233_1: Na ceteti tathā heṭṭhimajjhānesu viya vā pubbābhogābhāvato pubbābhogavasena hi jhānaṃ pakappento idha “cetetī”ti vutto.
tika-s0101t0:1233_2: Yasmā “ahametaṃ jhānaṃ nibbattemi upasampādemi samāpajjāmī”ti evaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ tattha sālayasseva hoti,
tika-s0101t0:1233_4: tasmā ekaṃ cittakkhaṇikampi jhānaṃ pavattento tattha appahīnanikantikatāya abhisaṅkharonto evāti attho.
tika-s0101t0:1233_5: Yasmā panassa tathā heṭṭhimajjhānesu viya vā tattha pubbābhogo natthi,
tika-s0101t0:1234_4: Āsanasālā viya ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti tato pitugharaputtagharaṭṭhāniyānaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatananirodhasamāpattīnaṃ upagantabbato.
tika-s0101t0:1234_5: Pitugharaṃ amanasikaritvāti pavisitvā samatikkantampi pitugharaṃ na manasi katvā.
tika-s0101t0:1234_6: Puttagharasseva ācikkhanaṃ viya ekaṃ dve cittavāre samāpajjitabbampi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ na manasi
tika-s0101t0:1234_9: manasikārasāmaññena ca upamupameyyatā veditabbā ācikkhanenapi manasikārasseva jotitattā.
tika-s0101t0:1234_10: Na hi manasikārena vinā ācikkhanaṃ sambhavati.
tika-s0101t0:1235_0: Tā jhānasaññāti tā ekaṃ dve cittavāre pavattā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññā.
tika-s0101t0:1235_4: evaṃ itarasaññānaṃ pīti āha “aññā ca oḷārikā bhavaṅgasaññā nuppajjantī”ti,
tika-s0101t0:1235_6: So evaṃ paṭipanno bhikkhūti so evaṃ yathāvutte saññāgge ṭhito arahatte,
tika-s0101t0:1235_7: anāgāmiphale vā patiṭṭhito bhikkhu dvīhi phalehi samannāgamo,
tika-s0101t0:1235_10: navavidhā samādhicariyāti imesaṃ vasena nirodhapaṭipādanapaṭipattiṃ paṭipanno.
tika-s0101t0:1235_11: Phusatīti ettha phusanaṃ nāma vindanaṃ paṭiladdhīti āha “vindati paṭilabhatī”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1235_12: Atthato pana yathāparicchinnakālaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ sabbaso appavatti eva.
tika-s0101t0:1236_2: Nirodhapadena anantarikaṃ katvā samāpattipade vattabbe tesaṃ dvinnaṃ antare sampajānapadaṃ ṭhapitanti āha “nirodhapadena anantarikaṃ katvā vutta”nti,
tika-s0101t0:1236_4: Tatrāpīti tasmimpi tathā padānupubbiṭhapanepi ayaṃ visesatthoti yojanā.
tika-s0101t0:1236_5: Sampajānantassāti taṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha tattha saṅkhārānaṃ sammasanavasena pajānantassa.
tika-s0101t0:1236_8: tena nirodhasamāpajjanakassa bhikkhuno ādito paṭṭhāya sabbapāṭihārikapaññāya saddhiṃ atthasādhikā paññā kiccato dassitā hoti,
tika-s0101t0:1237_6: na idha taṃ vadāma punaruttibhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0101t0:1238_0: Evaṃ kho ahanti ettha ākārattho evaṃ-
tika-s0101t0:1239_3: Aṭṭhasu samāpattīsupi saññāggaṃ atthi upalabbhatīti cintetvā.
tika-s0101t0:1239_8: Jhānaṃ tāva yutto karaṇabhāvo saññānirodhaphusanassa sādhakatamabhāvato,
tika-s0101t0:1239_11: Yadaggena hi jhānānaṃ nirodhaphusanassa sādhakataṃ abhāvo,
tika-s0101t0:1239_13: Anekakaraṇāpi kiriyā hotiyeva yathā “assena yānena dīpikāya gacchatī”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1240_3: Ekaṃ saññāgganti ekaṃ saññābhūtaṃ aggaṃ seṭṭhanti attho heṭṭhimasaññāya ukkaṭṭhabhāvato.
tika-s0101t0:1240_8: Tato eva cettha jhānaggahaṇena kasiṇajjhānāni eva gahitānīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1240_9: “Paṭhamajjhānena karaṇabhūtenā”ti ārammaṇaṃ anāmasitvā vadati yathā “yena yena kasiṇenā”ti ettha jhānaṃ anāmasitvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1241_1: Jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa puggalassa vasena saññāñāṇāni dassitāni paṭhamanaye.
tika-s0101t0:1241_2: Dutiyanaye pana yasmā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggena ghaṭentassa maggañāṇaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0101t0:1241_5: dutiyanayo missako tasmā tadubhayaṃ asambhāvetvā accantasukhumaṃ subhaṃ thiraṃ nibbattitalokuttarameva
tika-s0101t0:1242_1: Nirodhaṃ pucchitvā tasmiṃ kathite tadanantaraṃ saññāñāṇuppattiṃ pucchanto atthato nirodhato vuṭṭhānaṃ pucchati nāma,
tika-s0101t0:1242_2: nirodhato ca vuṭṭhānaṃ arahattaphaluppattiyā vā siyā anāgāmiphaluppattiyā vā,
tika-s0101t0:1242_4: tadanantarañca paccavekkhaṇañāṇanti tadubhayaṃ niddhārento thero “kiṃ ime bhikkhū bhaṇantī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0101t0:1242_5: Tattha “kiṃ ime bhikkhū bhaṇantī”ti tadā dīghanikāyatantiṃ parivattante imaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā yathāvuttena
tika-s0101t0:1242_6: paṭipāṭiyā tayo naye kathente bhikkhū sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0101t0:1243_0: Yassa yathā maggavīthiyaṃ maggaphalañāṇesu uppannesu niyamato maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇañāṇāni honti,
tika-s0101t0:1243_6: Samādhisīsena cettha sabbaṃ arahattaphalaṃ gahitaṃ sahacaraṇañāyena,
tika-s0101t0:1243_7: tasmiṃ asati paccavekkhaṇāya asambhavo evāti āha “idappaccayā”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1245_1: Desanāya saṇhabhāvena sārambhamakkhissādimalavisodhanato sutamayañāṇaṃ nhāpitaṃ viya,
tika-s0101t0:1245_4: tadanupasevato ñāṇassa ca tathābhāvo taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa tathābhāvāpatti,
tika-s0101t0:1245_11: Anumatiṃ gahetvāti anuññaṃ gahetvā “ediso me attā”ti anujānāpetvā,
tika-s0101t0:1245_14: arūpīti tiṇṇaṃ attavādānaṃ vasena tividhesu katamanti attho.
tika-s0101t0:1245_17: Yasmā catusantatirūpappabandhaṃ ekattavasena gahetvā rūpībhāvato “oḷāriko attā”ti pacceti attavādī,
tika-s0101t0:1245_19: rūpībhāvato eva ca saññāya aññattaṃ ñāyāgatameva,
tika-s0101t0:1245_22: tasmā paribbājako taṃ sandhāyā “oḷārikaṃ kho”ti āha.
tika-s0101t0:1246_0: Tattha yadi attā rūpī, na saññī,
tika-s0101t0:1246_3: rūpī ca samāno yadi tava matena nicco,
tika-s0101t0:1246_4: saññā aparāparaṃ pavattanato tattha tattha bhijjatīti bhedasabbhāvato aniccā,
tika-s0101t0:1246_6: añño attā”ti saññāya abhāvato acetanoti na kammassa kārako,
tika-s0101t0:1246_12: aññā ca saññā nirujjhantī”ti kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:1246_14: na ca uppannaṃ anirujjhakaṃ nāma atthīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “catunnañca khandhāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0101t0:1247_8: Dose dinneti “aññāva saññā bhavissatī”tiādinā dose dinne.
tika-s0101t0:1247_15: na ca saññī”ti pubbe viya vattabbaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0101t0:1247_17: Kasmā panāyaṃ paribbājako paṭhamaṃ oḷārikaṃ attānaṃ paṭijānitvā taṃ laddhiṃ vissajjetvā puna manomayaṃ attānaṃ paṭijānāti,
tika-s0101t0:1247_20: tathāpi ime titthiyā nāma anavaṭṭhitacittā thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇuko viya cañcalāti dassetuṃ “yathā nāma ummattako”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1247_22: Uppādanirodhaṃ icchati aparāparaṃ pavattāya saññāya udayavayadassanato.
tika-s0101t0:1247_23: Tathāpi “saññā saññā”ti pavattasamaññaṃ “attā”ti gahetvā tassa ca avicchedaṃ parikappento sassataṃ maññati,
tika-s0101t0:1248_1: “manomayo attā”ti ca vādadvaye saññāya attato aññatā,
tika-s0101t0:1248_8: samūhaghanena ca vañcito bālo pabandhavasena pavattamānaṃ dhammasamūhaṃ micchāgāhavasena “attā”ti,
tika-s0101t0:1248_10: taṃ ekattasaññitaṃ ghanaggahaṇaṃ vinibhujja yāthāvato jānanaṃ ghanavinibbhogo,
tika-s0101t0:1248_11: sabbena sabbaṃ titthiyānaṃ so natthīti ayampi paribbājako tādisassa ñāṇassa paripākassa abhāvato vuccamānampi nāññāsi.
tika-s0101t0:1248_12: Tena vuttaṃ “bhagavatā vuccamānampi taṃ nānattaṃ ajānanto”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1248_14: veti cāti saññāya uppādanirodhaṃ passantopi saññāmayaṃ saññābhūtaṃ attānaṃ parikappetvā yathāvuttaghanavinibbhogābhāvato
tika-s0101t0:1248_16: Tathābhūtassa ca tassa saṇhasukhumaparamagambhīradhammatā na ñāyatevāti vuttaṃ “dujjānaṃ kho”tiādi.
tika-s0101t0:1249_1: Tassā eva pubbabhāgabhūtaṃ “evameta”nti nijjhānavasena khamanaṃ khanti.
tika-s0101t0:1249_4: Tattha aññathāti yathā ariyavinaye antadvayaṃ anupaggamma majjhimā paṭipadāvasena dassanaṃ hoti,
tika-s0101t0:1249_8: tato aññadeva paramatthato avijjamānaṃ attānaṃ sassatādi te khamati ceva ruccati ca.
tika-s0101t0:1249_16: imaṃ panatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā yathā paṭipajji,
tika-s0101t0:1249_18: Añño vā saññatoti saññāsabhāvato añño sabhāvo vā attā hotūti attho.
tika-s0101t0:1250_4: Diṭṭhigatanti “sassato attā ca loko cā”tiādi nayappavattaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1250_7: so taṃnissitoti vattabbataṃ labheyya yathā taṃ puññañāṇasambhāro.
tika-s0101t0:1250_8: Eteneva tassa na dhammanissitatāpi saṃvaṇṇitā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0101t0:1250_18: taṃ pana vaṭṭassa paccakkhakaraṇameva hotīti āha “paccakkhakiriyāyā”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1251_1: tassā pana samudayabhāvena visuṃ gahitattā “taṇhaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1251_3: Dukkhaṃ pabhāventīpi taṇhā avijjādipaccayantarasahitā eva pabhāveti,
tika-s0101t0:1251_6: nappavattanti ettha dukkhasamudayā etasmiṃ vā adhigateti appavatti.
tika-s0101t0:1252_3: Sajjhabbharitanti samantato bhusaṃ aritaṃ akaṃsūti satamattehi tuttakehi viya tiṃsasatamattā paribbājakā
tika-s0101t0:1252_4: vācāpatodanehi tudiṃsu sabhāvato vijjamānanti paramatthasabhāvato upalabbhamānaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:1252_7: Tathanti aviparītaṃ lokuttaradhammesūti visaye bhummaṃ te dhamme visayaṃ katvā.
tika-s0101t0:1254_2: Kusaloti pubbe buddhasāsane kataparicayatāya cheko ahosi.
tika-s0101t0:1254_3: Gihibhāve ānisaṃsakathāya kathitattā sīlavantassa bhikkhuno tathā kathanena vibbhamane niyojitattā idāni sayampi sīlavā eva hutvā cha vāre vibbhami.
tika-s0101t0:1254_6: Patiṭṭhātuṃ asakkontoti sāsane patiṭṭhaṃ laddhuṃ asakkonto.
tika-s0101t0:1255_2: Cakkhumāti ettha yādisena cakkhunā puriso “cakkhumā”ti vutto,
tika-s0101t0:1257_16: na pana paramatthato tesaṃ samaye nibbānapaññāpanassa labbhanato,
tika-s0101t0:1257_23: yaññehi jutena parena purisena salokatā mokkho,
tika-s0101t0:1257_29: Paṇḍitehi paṭikkhittāti “nāyaṃ niṭṭhā paṭipadā vaṭṭassa anatikkamanato”ti buddhādīhi paṇḍitehi paṭikkhittā.
tika-s0101t0:1257_31: tasmā tehi paññattā niṭṭhā paṭipadā na niyyāti,
tika-s0101t0:1257_32: aññadatthu taṃsamaṅginaṃ puggalaṃ saṃsāre eva paribbhamāpentī nivattati.
tika-s0101t0:1258_0: Padhānaṃ jānanaṃ nāma paccakkhato jānanaṃ tassa pamāṇajeṭṭhabhāvato,
tika-s0101t0:1258_4: tumhākaṃ ekantasukhe loke paccakkhato ñāṇadassanaṃ atthīti.
tika-s0101t0:1258_5: Jānanti vā tassa lokassa anumānavisayataṃ pucchati,
tika-s0101t0:1259_0: Yasmā loke paccakkhabhūto attho indriyagocarabhāvena pākaṭo,
tika-s0101t0:1259_6: “Appāṭihīraka ta”nti anunāsikalopaṃ katvā niddesoti āha “appāṭihīrakaṃ ta”nti “appāṭihīraṃ kata”nti evamettha vaṇṇenti.
tika-s0101t0:1259_11: Na pāṭihīrakaṃ appāṭihīrakaṃ parehi vuccamānauttarehi sauttarattā,
tika-s0101t0:1259_13: Sauttarañhi vacanaṃ tena uttarena paṭihārīyati ativiparivattīyati.
tika-s0101t0:1259_14: Tato eva niyyānassa paṭiharaṇamaggassa abhāvato “aniyyānika”nti vattabbataṃ labhati.
tika-s0101t0:1262_4: Rūpabhavaṃ dasseti jhānamanena nibbattaṃ hutvā rūpībhāvena upalabbhanato.
tika-s0101t0:1262_5: Saṃkilesikā dhammā nāma dvādasa akusalacittuppādā tadabhāve kassaci saṃkilesassāpi asambhavato.
tika-s0101t0:1262_6: Vodāniyā dhammā nāma samathavipassanā tāsaṃ vasena sabbaso cittavodānassa sijjhanato.
tika-s0101t0:1263_1: Paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ asamucchede pana na kadācipi anavajjadhammānaṃ pāripūrī,
tika-s0101t0:1263_3: samucchede pana sati eva sambhavatīti maggapaññāphalapaññā- ggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1263_4: Tā hi sakiṃ paripuṇṇā paripuṇṇā eva aparihānadhammattā.
tika-s0101t0:1263_6: Balavatuṭṭhīti punappunaṃ uppattiyā laddhāsevanā uparivisesādhigamassa paccayabhūtā thiratarā pīti.
tika-s0101t0:1263_8: yaṃ vohāraṃ “saṃkilesikavodāniyadhammānaṃ pahānābhivuddhiniṭṭhaṃ paññāya pāripūrivepullabhūtaṃ imasmiṃyeva
tika-s0101t0:1263_9: attabhāve aparappaccayena ñāṇena paccakkhato sampādetvā viharissatī”ti kathayimha.
tika-s0101t0:1263_10: Tattha tasmiṃ vihāre tassa mama ovādakarassa bhikkhuno evaṃ vuttappakārena viharaṇanimittaṃ pamodappabhāvitā pīti ca bhavissati,
tika-s0101t0:1263_11: tassā ca paccayabhūtaṃ passaddhidvayaṃ sammadeva upaṭṭhitā sati ca ukkaṃsagataṃ ñāṇañca tathābhūto ca so vihāro.
tika-s0101t0:1263_12: Santapaṇītatāya atappako anaññasādhāraṇo sukhavihāroti vattabbataṃ arahatīti.
tika-s0101t0:1264_0: Paṭhamajjhāne paṭiladdhamatte hīnabhāvato pīti dubbalā pāmojjapakkhikā,
tika-s0101t0:1264_1: suvibhāvite pana tasmiṃ paguṇe sā paṇītā balavabhāvato paripuṇṇakiccā pītīti vuttaṃ “paṭhamajjhāne pāmojjādayo chapi dhammā labbhantī”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1264_4: tesaṃ matena santasukhatāya upekkhā catutthajjhāne “sukha”nti icchitā,
tika-s0101t0:1264_6: Pāmojjaṃ nivattatīti dubbalapītisaṅkhātaṃ pāmojjaṃ chasu dhammesu nivattati hāyati.
tika-s0101t0:1264_7: Vitakkavicārakkhobhavirahena dutiyajjhāne sabbadā pīti balavatī eva hoti,
tika-s0101t0:1264_9: Suddhavipassanā pādakajjhānamevāti upari maggaṃ akathetvā kevalaṃ vipassanāpādakajjhānaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1264_10: Catūhi maggehi saddhiṃ vipassanā kathitāti vipassanāya pādakabhāvena jhānāni kathetvā tato paraṃ vipassanāpubbakā cattāropi maggā kathitāti attho.
tika-s0101t0:1264_11: Catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpatti kathitāti paṭhamajjhānikādikā phalasamāpattiyo akathetvā catutthajjhānikā eva phalasamāpatti kathitā.
tika-s0101t0:1264_12: Pītivevacanameva katvāti dvinnaṃ pītīnaṃ ekasmiṃ cittuppāde anuppajjanato pāmojjaṃ pītivevacanameva katvā.
tika-s0101t0:1264_14: “sukho ca vihāro”ti sātisayassa sukhavihārassa gahitattā ca dutiyajjhānikaphalasamāpatti nāma kathitā.
tika-s0101t0:1265_7: Tasmiṃ samaye hotīti tasmiṃ paccuppannasamaye vijjamāno hoti.
tika-s0101t0:1265_10: Rūpādayo cettha dhammāti rūpavedanādayo eva ettha loke sabhāvadhammā.
tika-s0101t0:1265_11: Attapaṭilābhoti pana te rūpādike pañcakkhandhe upādāya paññatti,
tika-s0101t0:1266_1: Evañca pana vatvāti “attapaṭilābhoti rūpādike upādāya paññattimatta”nti imamatthaṃ “yasmiṃ citta samaye”tiādinā vatvā.
tika-s0101t0:1266_3: tenākārena kālavibhāgato paṭipadāni pucchitvā tassa atthassa ñāpanavasena vinayanatthaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1266_4: Tasmiṃ samaye sacco ahosīti tasmiṃ atītasamaye upādānassa vijjamānatāya saccabhūto vijjamāno viya vattabbo ahosi,
tika-s0101t0:1266_5: na pana anāgato idāni paccuppanno vā attapaṭilābho tadupādānassa tadā avijjamānattā.
tika-s0101t0:1266_6: Ye te atītā dhammā atītasamaye atītattapaṭilābhassa upādānabhūtā rūpādayo.
tika-s0101t0:1266_10: Sopi tadupādāno me attapaṭilābho tasmiṃyeva atītasamaye sacco bhūto vijjamāno viya ahosi.
tika-s0101t0:1266_11: Anāgatapaccuppannānanti anāgatānañceva paccuppannānañca rūpadhammānaṃ upādānabhūtānaṃ tadā tasmiṃ atītasamaye
tika-s0101t0:1266_12: abhāvā tadupādāno anāgato paccuppanno ca attapaṭilābho tasmiṃ atītasamaye mogho tuccho musā natthīti attho.
tika-s0101t0:1267_0: “Eseva nayo”ti iminā ye te anāgatā dhammā,
tika-s0101t0:1267_3: tasmā sopi me attapaṭilābho tasmiṃyeva samaye sacco bhavissati.
tika-s0101t0:1267_4: Atītapaccuppannānaṃ pana dhammānaṃ tadā abhāvā tasmiṃ samaye mogho atīto mogho paccuppanno.
tika-s0101t0:1267_9: Atītānāgatānaṃ pana dhammānaṃ idāni abhāvā tasmiṃ samaye mogho atīto mogho anāgatoti evaṃ atthato nāmamattameva
tika-s0101t0:1268_2: Yasmiṃ samaye khīraṃ hotīti yasmiṃ kāle bhūtupādāyasaññitaṃ upādānavisesaṃ upādāya khīrapaññatti hoti.
tika-s0101t0:1268_12: Esa nayo sabbatthāti “yasmiṃ samaye”tiādinā khīre vuttanayaṃ dadhiādīsu atidisati.
tika-s0101t0:1269_1: idaṃ dadhī”tiādinā tādise bhūtupādāyarūpavisese loke paramparābhataṃ paññattiṃ appaṭikkhipitvā samanujānanaṃ
tika-s0101t0:1269_2: viya paccayavisesavisiṭṭhaṃ rūpādikhandhasamūhaṃ upādāya “oḷāriko attapaṭilābho”ti ca “manomayo attapaṭilābho”ti
tika-s0101t0:1269_3: ca “arūpo attapaṭilābho”ti ca tathā tathā samanujānanamattakāni,
tika-s0101t0:1269_4: na ca tabbinimutto upādānato añño koci attho atthīti attho.
tika-s0101t0:1269_11: Sabbametanti “attapaṭilābho”ti vā “satto”ti vā “poso”ti vā sabbametaṃ vohāramattakaṃ paramatthato anupalabbhanato,
tika-s0101t0:1270_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā taṃ buddhehipi vuccatīti āha “buddhānaṃ pana dve kathā”tiādi.
tika-s0101t0:1270_7: Kasmā panevaṃ duvidhā buddhānaṃ kathāpavattīti tattha kāraṇamāha “tattha yo”tiādinā.
tika-s0101t0:1270_10: tasmā vineyyapuggalavasena sammutikathaṃ kathentopi bhagavā paramatthakathaṃyeva kathetīti āha “tassa bhagavā āditova…pe…
tika-s0101t0:1270_13: tenassa katthaci sammutikathāpubbikā paramatthakathā hoti puggalajjhāsayavasena,
tika-s0101t0:1270_15: Iti vineyyadamanakusalassa satthu vineyyajjhāsayavasena tathā tathā desanāpavattīti dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:1270_16: Sabbattha pana bhagavā dhammataṃ avijahanto eva sammutiṃ anuvattati,
tika-s0101t0:1271_0: Paṭhamaṃ sammutiṃ katvā kathanaṃ pana veneyyavasena yebhuyyena buddhānaṃ āciṇṇanti taṃ kāraṇena saddhiṃ dassento “pakatiyā panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0101t0:1271_1: Nanu ca sammuti nāma paramatthato avijjamānattā abhūtā,
tika-s0101t0:1271_2: taṃ kathaṃ buddhā kathentīti āha “sammutikathaṃ kathentāpī”tiādi.
tika-s0101t0:1272_2: buddhiyā vā avayavavinibbhoge kate na taṃsaññā,
tika-s0101t0:1272_5: Na hi kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāve ayaṃ nayo labbhati.
tika-s0101t0:1272_6: Evaṃ santepi vuttanayena sammutipi saccasabhāvā evāti āha “duve saccāni akkhāsī”tiādi.
tika-s0101t0:1273_0: Idāni nesaṃ saccasabhāvaṃ kāraṇena dassento “saṅketavacanaṃ saccanti gāthamāha.
tika-s0101t0:1273_3: Lokasiddhā hi sammuti saṅketavacanassa avisaṃvādanatāya kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1273_6: Tassa vacanaṃ saccaṃ yāthāvato avisaṃvādanavasena ca pavattanato.
tika-s0101t0:1274_0: Yadi tathāgato paramatthasaccaṃ sammadeva abhisambujjhitvā ṭhitopi lokasamaññaṃ gahetvāva vadati,
tika-s0101t0:1274_4: tathāgato pana sabbaso pahīnaparāmāsattā aparāmasanto yasmā lokasamaññāhi vinā lokiyo attho loke kenaci duviññeyyo,
tika-s0101t0:1274_6: Tathā voharanto eva ca attano desanāvilāsena veneyyasatte paramatthasacce patiṭṭhapeti.
tika-s0101t0:1274_7: Desanaṃ vinivaṭṭetvāti heṭṭhā pavattitakathāya vinivaṭṭetvā vivecetvā desanaṃ “aparāmāsa”nti taṇhāmānaparāmāsappahānakittanena
tika-s0101t0:1274_9: Yaṃ yaṃ panettha atthato na vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:1276_2: kālaparicchedo na dassitoti taṃ paricchedato dassetuṃ “parinibbānato uddhaṃ māsamatte kāle”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1276_6: Taṃ panesa yasmā soṇadaṇḍo viya campaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:1276_10: Paṇḍito gharamāvaseti yasmā appatarappatarepi vayamāne bhogā khiyanti,
tika-s0101t0:1276_12: tasmā viññujātiko kiñci vayaṃ akatvā āyameva uppādento gharāvāsaṃ anutiṭṭheyyāti lobhādesitaṃ paṭipattiṃ upadisati.
tika-s0101t0:1277_0: Adānameva sikkhāpetvā lobhābhibhūtatāya tasmiṃyeva ghare sunakho hutvā nibbatti.
tika-s0101t0:1277_4: Niraye nibbattissasi katokāsassa kammassa paṭibāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvato.
tika-s0101t0:1278_1: tathā pitaraṃ ukkaṃsento ca “brahmaloke nibbatto”ti āha.
tika-s0101t0:1278_2: Taṃ pavattiṃ pucchīti sutametaṃ mayā “mayhaṃ pitā sunakho hutvā nibbatto”ti tumhehi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:1278_4: Tatheva vatvāti yathā pubbe sunakhassa vuttaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:1278_6: Avisaṃvādanatthanti saccāpanatthaṃ “todeyyabrāhmaṇo sunakho hutvā nibbatto”ti attano vacanassa avisaṃvādanatthaṃ
tika-s0101t0:1278_8: Sabbaṃ dassesīti buddhānubhāvena so sunakho taṃ sabbaṃ netvā dassesi,
tika-s0101t0:1278_11: Cuddasa pañhe pucchitvāti “dissanti hi bho gotama manussā appāyukā,
tika-s0101t0:1279_1: “Ekā ca me kaṅkhā atthī”ti iminā upari pucchiyamānassa pañhassa pageva tena abhisaṅkhatabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:1279_4: Kāyaṃ gāḷhā hutvā bādhati pīḷetīti “ābādho”ti ca vuccati.
tika-s0101t0:1279_5: Ekadese uppajjitvāti sarīrassa ekadese uṭṭhitāpi ayapaṭṭena ābandhitvā viya gaṇhāti aparivattabhāvakaraṇato,
tika-s0101t0:1279_8: etena dubbalo appamattako rogo ātaṅkoti dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:1279_10: tena yathā tathā aparāparaṃ sarīrassa parivattanaṃ vadati.
tika-s0101t0:1279_12: Kāye balaṃ na hotīti etthāpi “gilānassevā”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1279_13: Heṭṭhā catūhi padehi aphāsuvihārābhāvaṃ pucchitvā idāni phāsuvihārasabbhāvaṃ pucchati,
tika-s0101t0:1279_15: asatipi atisayatthajotane sadde atisayatthassa labbhanato yathā “abhirūpāya deyyaṃ dātabba”nti.
tika-s0101t0:1280_5: Upādānaṃ nāma ñāṇena tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ sallakkhaṇanti dassetuṃ “kālañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1281_3: Cetiraṭṭhato aññaṃ visuṃyevekaṃ raṭṭhanti ca vadanti.
tika-s0101t0:1281_4: Maraṇapaṭisaṃyuttanti maraṇaṃ nāma tādisānaṃ roga vaseneva hotīti yena rogena taṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:1281_9: tathā maraṇassa ca appatikāratāti evaṃ ādinā maraṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathesīti dassetuṃ “bho ānandā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1282_1: Atthappayuttatāya saddapayogassa saddappabandhalakkhaṇāni tīṇi piṭakāni tadatthabhūtehi sīlādīhi dhammakkhandhehi
tika-s0101t0:1282_2: saṅgayhantīti vuttaṃ “tīṇi piṭakāni tīhi khandhehi saṅgahetvā”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1282_3: Saṅkhittena kathitanti “tiṇṇaṃ khandhāna”nti evaṃ gahaṇato sāmaññato cāti saṅkhepeneva kathitaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1282_5: na kathetukamyatā pucchāti vuttaṃ “vitthārato pucchissāmī ‘ti cintetvā ‘katamesaṃ tiṇṇa’nti āhā”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1284_5: patiṭṭhāpesī”ti ayaṃ ettako pāṭho dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ tenāha “tesu dassitesū”ti,
tika-s0101t0:1284_9: Sāsane na sīlameva sāroti ariyamaggasāre bhagavato sāsane yathā dassitaṃ sīlaṃ sāro eva na hoti sāravato mahato rukkhassa papaṭikaṭṭhāniyattā.
tika-s0101t0:1284_10: Yadi evaṃ kasmā idha gahitanti āha “kevalañhetaṃ patiṭṭhāmattakamevā”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1284_11: Jhānādiuttarimanussadhamme adhigantukāmassa adhiṭṭhānamattaṃ tattha appatiṭṭhitassa tesaṃ asambhavato.
tika-s0101t0:1284_12: Atha vā na sīlameva sāroti kāmañcettha sāsane “maggasīlaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:1284_14: tathāpi na sīlakkhandho eva sāro atha kho samādhikkhandhopi paññākkhandhopi sāro evāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0101t0:1286_1: Kasmā panettha thero samādhikkhandhaṃ puṭṭho indriyasaṃvarādike vissajjesi,
tika-s0101t0:1286_2: nanu evaṃ sante aññaṃ puṭṭho aññaṃ byākaronto ambaṃ puṭṭho labujaṃ byākaronto viya hotīti īdisī codanā
tika-s0101t0:1286_5: tenettha indriyasaṃvarādayopi samādhiupakārataṃ upādāya samādhikkhandhapakkhikāni uddiṭṭhānīti dasseti rūpajjhānāneva āgatāni,
tika-s0101t0:1286_6: na arūpajjhānāni rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānadesanānantaraṃ abhiññādesanāya avasaroti katvā.
tika-s0101t0:1286_8: Lokiyā abhiññā pana sijjhamānā yasmā aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu cuddasavidhena cittaparidamanena vinā na ijjhanti,
tika-s0101t0:1286_9: tasmā abhiññāsu desiyamānāsu arūpajjhānānipi desitāneva honti nānantariyabhāvato,
tika-s0101t0:1286_11: Vuttanayena desitāneva katvā saṃvaṇṇakehi pakāsetabbānīti attho.
tika-s0101t0:1286_12: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “catutthajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti imināva arūpajjhānampi saṅgahitanti dassetuṃ “catutthajjhānena hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1287_1: Na cittekaggatāmattakenevāti ettha heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0101t0:1287_6: Tathā heṭṭhāpi lokiyābhiññāpaṭisambhidāhi vināva arahatte adhigate nattheva uttariṃkaraṇīyanti sakkā
tika-s0101t0:1289_2: Taṃ kira so seṭṭhī bhagavato anucchavikaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ,
tika-s0101t0:1289_3: bhikkhusaṅghassa ca rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānakuṭimaṇḍapādīni sampādetvā pākāraparikkhittaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakasampannaṃ
tika-s0101t0:1289_7: Kevaṭṭoti idaṃ tassa nāmaṃ kevaṭṭehi saṃrakkhitattā,
tika-s0101t0:1289_9: “Gahapatiputtassā”ti ettha kāmaṃ tadā so gahapatiṭṭhāne ṭhito,
tika-s0101t0:1289_10: pitu panassa acirakālaṃkatatāya purimasamaññāya “gahapatiputto” tveva voharīyati,
tika-s0101t0:1289_16: Saddhāsampannoti pothujjanikāya saddhāya vasena saddhā samannāgato.
tika-s0101t0:1290_3: anusaṃvaccharaṃ vā manussānaṃ pasādāya iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ karohī”ti ekassa bhikkhuno āṇāpanaṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne
tika-s0101t0:1290_4: tassa ṭhapanaṃ nāma hotīti āha “ṭhānantare ṭhapetū”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1291_3: Vissāsaṃ vaḍḍhetvā bhagavati attano vissatthabhāvaṃ brūhetvā vibhūtaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā.
tika-s0101t0:1293_4: Tattha cūḷagandhārī nāma tivassato oraṃ matānaṃ sattānaṃ upapannaṭṭhānajānanavijjā.
tika-s0101t0:1293_5: Mahāgandhārī tampi jānāti tato uttaripi iddhividhañāṇakappaṃ yebhuyyena iddhividhakiccaṃ sādheti.
tika-s0101t0:1293_6: Tassā kira vijjāya sādhako puggalo tādise desakāle mantaṃ parijappitvā bahudhāpi attānaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0101t0:1295_1: Kāmaṃ “cetasika”nti padaṃ ye cetasi niyuttā cittena sampayuttā,
tika-s0101t0:1295_3: sādhāraṇe pana gahite cittaviseso gahitova hoti,
tika-s0101t0:1295_4: sāmaññajotanā ca visese avatiṭṭhatīti cetasikaggahaṇassa adhippāyaṃ vivaranto “somanassadomanassaṃ adhippeta”nti āha.
tika-s0101t0:1295_9: Evaṃ tava manoti iminā ākārena tava mano pavattoti attho.
tika-s0101t0:1295_12: na pana yena yena somanassito vā domanassito vā,
tika-s0101t0:1295_20: Parassa cintaṃ manati jānāti etenāti cintāmaṇi.
tika-s0101t0:1295_21: Tassā kira vijjāya sādhako puggalo tādise desakāle mantaṃ parijappitvā yassa cittaṃ jānitukāmo,
tika-s0101t0:1295_22: tassa diṭṭhasutādivisesasañjānanamukhena cittācāraṃ anuminanto kathetīti keci.
tika-s0101t0:1297_5: sā ca sammāvitakkānaṃ micchāvitakkānañca pavattiākāradassanavasena pavattati tattha ānisaṃsassa ādīnavassa ca vibhāvanatthaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1297_15: tappahānassa ca tadaññarāgādikhepanassa upāyabhāvato tathā vuttaṃ duṭṭhalohitavimocanassa pubbaduṭṭhamaṃsakhepanūpāyatā viya.
tika-s0101t0:1297_16: Lokuttaradhammamevāti avadhāraṇaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato sāvajjadhammanivattanaparaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ tassādhigamūpāyānisaṃsabhūtānaṃ
tika-s0101t0:1297_18: Iddhividhaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyanti dasseti iddhidassanena parasantāne pasādādīnaṃ paṭipakkhassa haraṇato.
tika-s0101t0:1298_5: “Dhammaṃ desesī”ti iminā anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ “buddhānaṃ satataṃ dhammadesanā”ti anusāsanīpāṭihāriyassa tattha sātisayatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1298_8: Sadosattā eva addhānaṃ na tiṭṭhanti cirakālaṭṭhāyīni na honti.
tika-s0101t0:1298_9: Addhānaṃ atiṭṭhanato na niyyantīti phalena hetuno anumānaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1298_19: anupārambhādiṃ cāti ubhayaṃ ubhayattha yathākkamaṃ gārayhapāsaṃsabhāvānaṃ hetubhāvena paccāmasati.
tika-s0101t0:1300_1: Aniyyānikabhāvadassanatthanti yasmā mahābhūtapariyesako bhikkhu purimesu dvīsu pāṭihāriyesu vasippatto
tika-s0101t0:1300_2: kusalopi samāno mahābhūtānaṃ aparisesanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ nāvabujjhi,
tika-s0101t0:1300_3: tasmā tāni niyyānāvahatābhāvato aniyyānikānīti tesaṃ aniyyānikabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1300_4: Tatiyaṃ pana takkarassa ekantato niyyānāvahanti tasseva niyyānikabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1301_0: Evametissā desanāya mukhyapayojanaṃ dassetvā idāni anusaṅgikampi dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1301_1: Mahābhūte pariyesantoti aparisesaṃ nirujjhanavasena mahābhūte gavesanto,
tika-s0101t0:1301_7: Mahantabhāvappakāsanatthanti sadevake loke anaññasādhāraṇassa buddhānaṃ mahantabhāvassa mahānubhāvatāya dīpanatthaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1301_8: Idañca kāraṇanti sabbesampi buddhānaṃ sāsane īdiso eko bhikkhu tadānubhāvappakāsano hotīti idampi kāraṇaṃ dassento.
tika-s0101t0:1302_2: Kiṃ āgammāti kiṃ ārammaṇaṃ paccayabhūtaṃ adhigantvā,
tika-s0101t0:1303_1: Dibbanti ettha pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samaṅgībhūtā hutvā vicaranti, kīḷanti,
tika-s0101t0:1303_4: Vasaṃ vattentoti ettha vasavattanaṃ nāma yathicchitaṭṭhānagamanaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1303_5: Cattāro mahārājāno etesaṃ issarāti cātumahārājikā yā devatā maggaphalalābhino tā tamatthaṃ ekadesena
tika-s0101t0:1303_6: jāneyyuṃ buddhavisayo panāyaṃ pañhoti cintetvā “na jānāmā”ti āhaṃsu,
tika-s0101t0:1303_9: Abhikkantatarāti rūpasampattiyā ceva paññāpaṭibhānādiguṇehi ca amhe abhibhuyya paresaṃ kāmanīyatarā.
tika-s0101t0:1304_3: sabbametaṃ iddhividhañāṇasseva nāma”nti idaṃ pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu ca tattha tattha āgataruḷhivasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1305_1: Āgamanapubbabhāge nimittanti brahmuno āgamanassa pubbabhāge uppajjananimittaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1306_7: Pucchāya dosaṃ dassetvāti tena katapucchāya pucchitākāre dosaṃ vibhāvetvā.
tika-s0101t0:1306_8: Yasmā vissajjanaṃ nāma pucchānurūpaṃ pucchāsabhāgena vissajjetabbato,
tika-s0101t0:1306_9: na ca tathāgatā virajjhitvā katapucchānurūpaṃ vissajjenti,
tika-s0101t0:1306_10: atthasabhāgatāya ca vissajjanassa pucchakā tadatthaṃ anavabujjhantā sammuyhanti,
tika-s0101t0:1307_4: Yasmā ekadisābhimukhaṃ santānavasena saṇṭhite rūpappabandhe dīghasamaññā taṃ upādāya tato appake rassasamaññā
tika-s0101t0:1307_6: tasmā āha “dīghañca rassañcāti saṇṭhānavasena upādārūpaṃ vutta”nti.
tika-s0101t0:1307_11: saddena cettha “saṇṭhānavasena upādārūpaṃ vutta”nti etthāpi vaṇṇamattameva kathitanti imamatthaṃ samuccinatīti vadanti.
tika-s0101t0:1307_23: Heṭṭhā “dīghaṃ rassa”ntiādinā vuttameva idha ruppanaṭṭhena “rūpa”nti gahitanti āha “dīghādibhedaṃ rūpañcā”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1307_29: tasmā dīgharassādiggahaṇena bhūtarūpampi gayhatevāti “dīghādibhedaṃ rūpa”micceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1307_30: Kiṃ āgammāti kiṃ adhigantvā kissa adhigamahetu.
tika-s0101t0:1308_10: Na hi nibbānassa niccassa ekassa accantasantapaṇītasabhāvassa sadisaṃ nidassanaṃ kutoci labbhatīti.
tika-s0101t0:1308_12: hutvā paṭiveti taṃ saṅkhataṃ udayavayantehi saantaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:1308_13: asaṅkhatassa pana nibbānassa niccassa te ubhopi antā na santi,
tika-s0101t0:1308_14: tato eva navabhāvāpagamasaṅkhāto jarantopi tassa natthīti āha “uppādanto…pe…
tika-s0101t0:1308_16: “Titthassa nāma”nti vatvā tattha nibbacanaṃ dassetuṃ “papanti etthāti papa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1308_22: taṃ santatipariyāpannānaṃyeva idha anuppādanirodho adhippetoti vuttaṃ “upādinnakadhammajātaṃ nirujjhati appavattaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1309_0: Tatthāti “viññāṇassa nirodhenā”ti yaṃ padaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmiṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1309_1: “Viññāṇa”nti viññāṇaṃ uddharati vibhattabbattā etthetaṃ uparujjhatīti etasmiṃ nibbāne etaṃ nāmarūpaṃ
tika-s0101t0:1309_5: “Abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassāpī”tiādināpi saupādisesanibbānamukhena anupādisesanibbānameva vadati nāmarūpassa anavasesato uparujjhanassa adhippetattā,
tika-s0101t0:1311_4: tassa vasena lohiccoti tassa brāhmaṇassa gottato āgataṃ nāmaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1312_1: “Diṭṭhigata”nti laddhimattaṃ adhippetanti āha “na pana ucchedasassatānaṃ aññatara”nti.
tika-s0101t0:1312_2: Na hi ucchedasassatagāhavinimutto koci diṭṭhigāho atthi.
tika-s0101t0:1312_3: “Bhāsati yevā”ti tassā laddhiyā loke pākaṭabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:1312_4: Attato añño paroti yathā anusāsakato anusāsitabbo paro,
tika-s0101t0:1312_5: evaṃ anusāsitabbatopi anusāsako paroti vuttaṃ “paro parassāti paro yo”tiādi. Kiṃ-
tika-s0101t0:1312_7: anāgatepi vā tena tassa kātabbaṃ natthīti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1312_8: Kusalaṃ dhammanti anavajjadhammaṃ nikkilesadhammaṃ vimokkhadhammanti attho.
tika-s0101t0:1312_9: “Paresaṃ dhammaṃ kathessāmī”ti tehi attānaṃ parivārāpetvā vicaraṇaṃ kiṃ atthiyaṃ āsayabuddhassāpi anurodhena
tika-s0101t0:1312_10: vinā taṃ na hotīti tasmā attanā paṭiladdhaṃ…pe…
tika-s0101t0:1314_3: Appeva nāma siyāti ettha pītivasena āmeḍitaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1314_5: Bhagavā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu visesato pītisomanassajāto hoti.
tika-s0101t0:1316_4: Sātisayena vā hitena anukampako anuggaṇhanako hitānukampī.
tika-s0101t0:1317_1: Dutiyaṃ upapattinti “nanu rājā pasenadī kosalo”tiādinā dutiyaṃ upapattiṃ sādhanayuttiṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1317_3: Ye cimeti ye ca ime kulaputtā dibbā gabbhā paripācentīti yojanā.
tika-s0101t0:1317_14: Evañca katvā “bhāvanaṃ bhāvayamānā”ti idampi vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0101t0:1317_15: Bhavanti ettha yathāruci sukhasamappitāti bhavā, vimānāni.
tika-s0101t0:1319_1: Aniyamitenevāti aniyameneva “tvaṃ evaṃdiṭṭhiko evaṃ sattānaṃ anatthassa kārako”ti evaṃ anuddesikeneva.
tika-s0101t0:1319_9: Catuttho pana sammāsambuddho na codanāraho hotīti “tena pucchite eva kathessāmī”ti codanārahe tayo satthāre paṭhamaṃ dassesi,
tika-s0101t0:1319_11: Kāmañcettha catuttho satthā eko adutiyo anaññasādhāraṇo,
tika-s0101t0:1319_12: tathāpi so yesaṃ uttarimanussadhammānaṃ vasena “dhammamayo kāyo”ti vuccati,
tika-s0101t0:1319_13: tesaṃ samudāyabhūtopi te guṇāvayave satthuṭṭhāniye katvā dassento bhagavā “ayampi kho, lohicca,
tika-s0101t0:1320_3: Sāvakattaṃ paṭijānitvā ṭhitattā ekadesenassa sāsanaṃ karontīti āha “nirantaraṃ tassa sāsanaṃ akatvā”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1320_8: Eko iccheyyāti eko puriso tāya anicchantiyā sampayogaṃ kāmeyya.
tika-s0101t0:1320_9: Osakkanādimukhena itthipurisasambandhanidassanaṃ gehasitaapekkhāvasena tassa satthuno sāvakesu paṭipattīti dasseti.
tika-s0101t0:1320_12: Tattha sampādehīti tasmiṃ paṭipattidhamme patiṭṭhitaṃ katvā sampādehi.
tika-s0101t0:1321_1: Evaṃ codanaṃ arahatīti evaṃ vuttanayena sāvakesu appossukkabhāvāpādane niyojanavasena codanaṃ arahati,
tika-s0101t0:1321_3: na ca dutiyo viya “attānameva tāva tattha sampādehī”tiādinā. Kasmā?
tika-s0101t0:1323_1: “Na codanāraho”ti ettha yasmā codanārahatā nāma satthuvippaṭipattiyā vā sāvakavippaṭipattiyā vā ubhayavippaṭipattiyā vā,
tika-s0101t0:1323_3: tasmā na codanārahoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “ayañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1324_1: Mayā gahitāya diṭṭhiyāti sabbaso anavajje sammāpaṭipanne paresaṃ sammadeva sammāpaṭipattiṃ dessente satthari
tika-s0101t0:1325_7: Attho pana sāmivaseneva icchitoti idha sāmivacanavaseneva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1328_2: So hi jaṅghāsu kilamathavinodanattho cāroti tathā vutto.
tika-s0101t0:1328_6: “Maggo”ti icchitaṭṭhānaṃ ujukaṃ maggati upagacchati etenāti maggo, ujumaggo.
tika-s0101t0:1329_3: tasmā “niyyāyanto”ti puggalassa yoniso paṭipajjanavasena niyyāyanto maggo “niyyātī”ti vutto.
tika-s0101t0:1329_12: Sakameva ācariyavādanti attano ācariyena pokkharasātinā kathitameva ācariyavādaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1329_13: Thometvā paggaṇhitvā “ayameva ujumaggo ayamañjasāyano”ti pasaṃsitvā ukkaṃsitvā.
tika-s0101t0:1329_14: Bhāradvājopi sakamevāti bhāradvājopi māṇavo attano ācariyena tārukkhena kathitameva ācariyavādaṃ thometvā paggaṇhitvā vicaratīti yojanā.
tika-s0101t0:1329_15: Tena vuttanti tena yathā tathā vā abhiniviṭṭhabhāvena vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1330_1: Aniyyānikā vāti appāṭihāriyāva aññamaññassa vāde dosaṃ dassetvā aviparītatthadassanatthaṃ uttararahitā eva.
tika-s0101t0:1330_3: sveva vivadanavasena aparāparaṃ uppanno vivādoti āha “pubbuppattiko viggaho aparabhāge vivādo”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1331_4: na maggo nu kho”ti saṃsayo vicikicchā natthi.
tika-s0101t0:1332_1: “Icchitaṭṭhānaṃ ujukaṃ maggati upagacchati etenāti maggo, ujumaggo.
tika-s0101t0:1332_3: Sabbe teti sabbepi te nānāācariyehi vuttamaggā.
tika-s0101t0:1333_5: Ye ca tittiriisinā kate mante sajjhāyanti,
tika-s0101t0:1334_1: yathā te nānāmaggā ekaṃsato tassa gāmassa vā nigamassa vā pavesāya honti,
tika-s0101t0:1334_2: evaṃ brāhmaṇehi paññāpiyamānāpi nānāmaggā brahmalokūpagamanāya brahmunā sahabyatāya ekaṃseneva hontīti.
tika-s0101t0:1335_4: “Paññāsasaṭṭhi andhā”ti idaṃ tassā andhapaveṇiyā mahato gacchagumbassa anuparigamanayogyatādassanaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1335_5: Evañhi te “suciraṃ velaṃ maggaṃ gacchāmā”ti evaṃ saññino honti.
tika-s0101t0:1335_7: taṃ pana bhāsitaṃ tehi sārasaññitampi nāmamattatāya asārabhāvato nihīnamevāti āha “lāmakaṃyevā”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1336_2: sāmaññajotanā ca visese avatiṭṭhatīti āha “yasmiṃ kāle”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1336_5: Ayaṃ kira brāhmaṇānaṃ laddhi “brāhmaṇānaṃ āyācanāya candimasūriyā gantvā loke obhāsaṃ karontī”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1337_1: Idha pana kiṃ vattabbanti imasmiṃ pana appaccakkhabhūtassa brahmuno sahabyatāya maggadesane tevijjānaṃ kiṃ vattabbaṃ atthi,
tika-s0101t0:1337_2: ye paccakkhabhūtānampi candimasūriyānaṃ sahabyatāya maggaṃ desetuṃ na sakkontīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0101t0:1340_4: “Punapī”ti vatvā “aparampī”ti vacanaṃ itarāyapi nadi upamāya saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1341_2: Bandhanaṭṭhenāti teneva kāmetabbabhāvena sattānaṃ cittassa ābandhanabhāvena.
tika-s0101t0:1341_5: tesaṃ panettha asambhavato pārisesañāyena bandhanaṭṭheyeva yuttoti dassetuṃ “anujānāmī”tiādinā atthuddhāro āraddho,
tika-s0101t0:1341_7: Na hi rūpādīnaṃ kāmetabbabhāve vuccamāne paṭalaṭṭho yujjati tathā kāmetabbatāya anadhippetattā.
tika-s0101t0:1341_8: Rāsaṭṭhaānisaṃsaṭṭhesupi eseva nayo tathāpi kāmetabbatāya anadhippetattā.
tika-s0101t0:1342_0: Koṭṭhāsaṭṭhopi tesu yujjateva cakkhuviññeyyādikoṭṭhāsabhāvena nesaṃ kāmetabbato.
tika-s0101t0:1345_0: Ādīsu sopi idha na yujjatīti anuddhaṭo.
tika-s0101t0:1346_4: taṃ idha nādhippetanti āha “pariyiṭṭhā vā hontu mā vā”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1347_0: Gedhenāti lobhena abhibhūtā hutvā pañcakāmaguṇe paribhuñjantīti yojanā.
tika-s0101t0:1348_6: Te hi āsevanabalavatāya purimapurimehi pacchimapacchimā daḷhataratamādibhāvappattā vuttā.
tika-s0101t0:1350_1: Itthipariggahe sati purisassa pañcakāmaguṇapariggaho paripuṇṇo eva hotīti vuttaṃ “sapariggahoti itthipariggahena sapariggaho”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1350_2: “Itthipariggahena apariggaho”ti ca idaṃ tevijjabrāhmaṇesu dissamānapariggahānaṃ duṭṭhullatamapariggahābhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1350_3: Evaṃbhūtānaṃ tevijjānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ kā brahmunā saṃsandanā,
tika-s0101t0:1350_12: Appaṭipattihetubhūtāya vicikicchāya sati na kadāci cittaṃ purisassa vase vattati,
tika-s0101t0:1350_13: pahīnāya pana siyā vasavattananti āha “vicikicchāya abhāvato cittaṃ vase vattetī”ti.
tika-s0101t0:1350_16: Na tādisoti brāhmaṇā viya cittavasiko na hoti,
tika-s0101t0:1350_17: atha kho vasībhūtajjhānābhiññatāya cittaṃ attano vase vattetīti vasavattī.
tika-s0101t0:1351_6: Paṅkaṃ otiṇṇā viyāti matthake ekaṅgulaṃ vā upaḍḍhaṅgulaṃ vā sukkhatāya “samatala”nti saññāya anekaporisaṃ mahāpaṅkaṃ otiṇṇā viya.
tika-s0101t0:1351_11: Sukkhataraṇaṃ maññe tarantīti sukkhanaditaraṇaṃ taranti maññe.
tika-s0101t0:1351_12: Tasmāti yasmā tevijjā amaggameva “maggo”ti upagantvā saṃsīdanti, tasmā.
tika-s0101t0:1351_13: Yathā teti yathā te “samatala”nti saññāya paṅkaṃ otiṇṇā.
tika-s0101t0:1351_15: Sukhaṃ vā sātaṃ vā na labhantīti jhānasukhaṃ vā vipassanāsātaṃ vā na labhanti,
tika-s0101t0:1351_16: kuto maggasukhaṃ vā nibbānasātaṃ vāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0101t0:1352_5: taṃ pana saṃsayavasena cirāyanaṃ nāma hotīti āha “kaṅkhāvasena cirāyitatta”nti.
tika-s0101t0:1352_7: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vitthāyitattaṃ nāma chambhitattanti adhippāyena “thaddhabhāvaggahaṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0101t0:1353_2: saddo uddharaṇattho hotīti “ullumpatū”ti padassa uddharatūti atthamāha.
tika-s0101t0:1355_5: Appanāva vaṭṭati paṭipakkhato sammadeva cetaso vimuttibhāvato.
tika-s0101t0:1356_0: Pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma kāmāvacaraṃ pamāṇakarānaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ avikkhambhanato.
tika-s0101t0:1356_1: Tathā hi taṃ brahmavihārapubbabhāgabhūtaṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā odissakaanodissakadisāpharaṇavasena vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkā.
tika-s0101t0:1356_2: Vuttavipariyāyato pana appamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma rūpārūpāvacaraṃ,
tika-s0101t0:1356_4: Tattha arūpāvacare odissakānodissakavasena pharaṇaṃ na labbhati,
tika-s0101t0:1357_0: Keci pana taṃ āgamanavasena labbhatīti vadanti,
tika-s0101t0:1357_4: tasmā yaṃ suvibhāvitaṃ vasībhāvaṃ pāpitaṃ āruppaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:1357_6: Yaṃ vā sātisayaṃ brahmavihārabhāvanāya abhisaṅkhatena santānena nibbattitaṃ,
tika-s0101t0:1357_8: taṃ iminā pariyāyena pharaṇappamāṇavasena appamāṇakatanti vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti apare.
tika-s0101t0:1358_2: Na ohīyati na tiṭṭhatīti katūpacitampi kāmāvacarakammaṃ yathādhigate mahaggatajjhāne aparihīne taṃ abhibhavitvā
tika-s0101t0:1358_3: paṭibāhitvā sayaṃ ohīyakaṃ hutvā paṭisandhiṃ dātuṃ samatthabhāve na tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0101t0:1358_8: Kammassa pariyādiyanaṃ nāma tassa vipākuppādanaṃ nisedhetvā attano vipākuppādananti āha “tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā”tiādi.
tika-s0101t0:1358_9: Evaṃ mettādivihārīti evaṃ vuttānaṃ mettādīnaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ vasena mettādivihārī.
tika-s0101t0:1359_2: alatthunti aggaññasutte āgatanayena upasampadañceva arahattañca alatthuṃ paṭilabhiṃsu.
